author: @huckleberryfynnn
text:
THANK YOU 
For constantly reminding me its okay.
When I got  burned out from studyingÂ 
I felt like the world is collapsing for me,
I felt as if I am drowning on a vast ocean
where the wave currents are pushing me down every time I got to breathe. 
Listening to us again,
I know, I'll get to ride the waves someday 
I am still a student but no matter what happen in the near 5-10 years I hope to do well
Seventeen please be there for meÂ 
till I get to sing with you in one of your concertsÂ 
till I pour out all my sadness and happiness with you guys

Thankful for seventeen always

author: @elaiineee
text:
"when you're lost, you can come to me. 
"we can find a way again" 

this part hits so hard. what else is more comforting than having the assurance that you have someone you can run to? they don't only listen, but will also tag along us so we won't be facing this alone. even though they really may not be here beside me physically, there are so many possible ways i can make it like it (by bringing their photocards, listening to their songs, watching their contents, and many more) and i couldn't ask for more. i mean, they don't really have to be with us when we're having a hard time and trying to solve whatever our problem is, but no; they will be with us in finding our way again. surely, seventeen does give us hope too.

author: @jzsvt
text:
Seventeen, this is coming from a fan you donâ€™t know, but ever since I discovered you, youâ€™ve become such a huge part of my life. I never imagined that I could love 13 people so deeply, but here I am, loving each one of you in a way that makes me happier than I could ever put into words. Itâ€™s a love that feels timeless, always there, and every time I see all of you together, itâ€™s like my heart gets a little fuller.

Youâ€™ve given me so much joy, comfort, and inspiration, and itâ€™s something I never expected to experience, but Iâ€™m so thankful for it. The way you all shine together, making everything feel like home, is a love that will never fade. Thank you for being you, for making me feel included and understood, and for being the light in my life.

author: @fenafeninta1805
text:
its my first carat day today.. i just became a carat like 2 months ago, a few days after i stated that i was into seventeen, my carat friends sent me this. i listened to it at work and cried a bit, then went home to listen to this more and cried even harder. i didnt even know the meaning but the instrumental was enough to make me teary. 

i didnt expect anything, i didnt know being a fangirl would build up so much emotions i never thought i'd get thru stanning a kpop boyband. but i cant stop crying listening to this, i feel loved even though i know they will never know me personally. they became my happy and safe place, i dont even know how to describe my feelings. i wish one day i get the chance to meet them and tell them how much they mean to me, how much they saved my life and how much happiness they bring to my exhausting days ever since i knew them. 

thanks for existing, seventeen. thanks for always giving your best and keeping us on your mind and heart. thanks for loving us from afar. i love you so much.

text: I was not given a chance to get a ticket for the upcoming 17 Right here concert here in the Philippines. While listening to this song, my heart is breaking, I'm sad, but just like minghao said, let's meet when we're fated to. That's all I'm holding on to now. Maybe it's not the right time for me to see them. I will wait when that time comes. Although I have enough money to secure but if it's really meant for you, it really meant for you.I'm just gonna wait when it's my turn to see seventeen. I'm happy for other carats who secured their tickets.  Enjoy and congratulations you deserved that. FIGHTING!!!!!

text: this hits different now, I'll always wait for you, my OT13! To my Junhui, believe me when I say that we are so proud of you for exploring and taking this opportunity to show the world what you are capable of! I'm so proud that you take this opportunity to pursue what you want, we will always support you, our actor Junjun!! And to our princess, counselor, mother of the group,  Jeonghan, I know that I'm not ready yet, and you acknowledge that last night, you know for sure that there's a lot crying last night, and that live gave us the assurance and healing that we all needed. We will always wait for you Hannie!! To both you, please take care of yourself!!! Maghihintay kami!!! author: @boraealis5836
text:
SVT is my comfort and I'm grateful for being a carat.

Unlike most of the carats I've seen in the comsec, I'm actually doing good. â€” is what I thought. Until the song reached the bridge and made me cry a bit. I didn't know the lyrics at all but it still made me tear up. 

I listened to it again, this time with a lyrics translation I found here in the comsec as well as in the video itself. It made me bawl my eyes out so hard.

"One day we'll be standing firm on these waves."
"Let's take a moment to catch our breath."
"The warmth and smiles at the end of the road will protect us from the time quickly passing us by."
 "You can slow down a bit."

All of these are words I never heard from anyone but seemingly the exact words I needed at this moment. Thank you SEVENTEEN.

Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega

author: @chiefcatto
text:
Coming back to here again because of CARAT Day.

Hmm.. where to start? Well. I joined the fandom on 2017. I just started collage, and experienced my first concert (Diamond Edge). I remember that I saved my money for that. And I never regret that decision even I only lasted a year before another group snatched me away for months. After that? Well. Lets see. College life was busy and hard, so I ended up being so damn away with the boys.

4 years later, during Pandemic, I had a really hard time. My dad got diagnosed with cancer and my parents got covid right before my dadâ€™s first chemo. My grandpa also passed away during that time. That was rough. I felt so lost. Until, my fyp showed me SEVENTEEN during their Be The Sun concert. They showed me light. They showed me that there will be sunshine after the rain. They made me learn that I will be okay at the end of the day.

Once I got back to the fandom, I realized that SEVENTEEN already big enough until I can find many CARATs when I went out. I felt so bad for being away for too long, yet also feel nice that I am able to find my way home.

Now I am stuck in here. In this Diamond Life. And I am grateful. Thank you for guiding me to the right way, SEVENTEEN. You always told us that we saved youâ€¦ but it is actually both ways. You saved some of us too.

Lets walk together for a really long time. ğŸ©·ğŸ©µ

text:
"Us, Again (ìš°ë¦¬, ë‹¤ì‹œ)"

[Romanized:]

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

author: @michi4w
text:
I never thought a kpop group can save me from the worst days of my life. I am so thankful that I learned to love you, your songs, your personality, all of you. I appreciate you guys coming to my life, giving me hope and strength to continue living happily. 

You deserve everything you have today, with all the daesang and support Carats all over the world, you guys deserve it and you deserve more. 

May you continue to be an inspiration to everyone, and i hope, all of you could take enough rest as well. We know you all get tired of the world tour and all. Carats will always love you no matter what.

I love you boys! Say the name, SEVENTEEN. Love from Philippines. â¤

author: @toyouhannie
text:
I come back to this song everytime I need to cry. Whenever I am having a very hard time, I like to coop up in my room under a blanket, plug in my earphones, play this and cry silently. I feel so much better. I have no one who could think of me that way, nor do I have anyone I could possibly dedicate this song to- but it is still my comfort song.

Thank you for saving my life, Seventeen. I will always keep coming back to this whenever I need a friend.

-a carat of 2 years.

author: @yanzie
text:
After getting their first mama daesang in 2023, I have watch back all the episodes of Hit The Road and also listen to this song. Once again, I felt how difficult it is for them to achieve such achievements. Their sincere to their fans, I have never been touched by a boygroup or even cry for them. I also feel lucky to become a CARAT. My life became interesting after stanning them. They started from nothing until today with so many achievements. They inspired me to become a person like them who never gives up, until the day to succeed, I will work harder for them to pursue my future. 
Last but not least,idk SEVENTEEN will see this but I would like to say thank you for existing and being a group that I have been proud of, and thank you for keep doing music!!!!!
To CARAT and anyone in the world, I hope one day we also can pursue our dream too!!!!

author: @iluvvvha
text:
Most of carats met seventeen in their lowest and actually i am one of them! 
Life has never been so hard to me than the year 2023, got cheated on by someone whom I had love with everything i ever owned, communal war going on in my state leading to burning of our house and every properties we had, got displaced in a new unfamiliar city because of that, everything happened so suddenly and thats when harsh reality hits me nothing is permanent in this world like everything and everyone can be taken away from you in a matter of few days, I thought i could never heal because nothing ever look beautiful to me again Just waking up, going to classes, cried myself to sleep that how my days went everyday since but then I suddenly met seventeen and just like that my happiness, my will to live, my smile returns back 
I can never be grateful enough to seventeen and now i love them tooo muchhh 
I pray to God that all 13 of them finds happiness in their life just like they bring my happiness back! I hope they are happy and content wherever they goes! 
Its irony how Seventeen always heal something they didnâ€™t break â¤

author: @C_clownwoo0
text: When I felt at my lowest point, I accidentally listened to Seventeen's song. At that time I started to get to know Seventeen. When I was still at my lowest point, I tried to get rid of my negative thoughts by listening to Seventeen songs which made me comfortable and not cry anymore.I once thought about ending my life before I met Seventeen. God is good, bringing me together with Seventeen who can change everything in my life.Thank you seventeen, now I feel better and happier.I hope you stay thirteen always and become a group that will entertain others. Always success for Seventeen and don't forget to take care of your health too. I hope that those who are experiencing depression at this time try listening to seventeen songs that make you comfortable and calm. Don't think about ending your life, but think that life has many obstacles, but for every obstacle, we have Seventeen who will calm us down when we are tired to face obstacles in life. Carat, don't be discouraged, we have Seventeen who will fill our lives so that we are always happier and happier. Don't forget to take care of your mental health, carat. And once again I say thank you to Seventeen, thank you for changing my life for the better. ğŸ¤ğŸ¤

author: @Jae-HwaYoon
text:
At this point, these thirteen boys, are my only reason for living. For me to commit su***de is nothing. But for me, they are my everything. Even if my family dies I wonâ€™t cry. But if any of them get a scratch I will drown in my tears. 

I saw them trying to learn English and Jeonghan learning Japanese, and seeing them making an effort to communicate with Carats, I am learning Chinese, Korean and Japanese. My schedule is tight enough and with trying to learn these languages, I actually just sleep for 7-8 hours a week. 

But for them Iâ€™d do ANYTHING. 
And I MEAN IT.

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri

text:
[Romanized:]

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

author: @Ho5hi_ne
text: They literally are our home. Their Music, Their Talent and Passion, Their Personality, Their Sincerity, Them- It is just amazing! There is a reason carats are said to be one of the most calmest and amazing fandoms, we had amazing teachers, rolemodels.. They appreciate each one of us so much and we reciprocate more than anything... If you look at most Carat's experiences, they found the 13 boys at their lowest and hardest times which they transformed into the best ones. It may sound a bit cliche, but They were truly send to earth as a comfort for millions of people! Seventeen is certainly the Brightest Diamond and I am sure that We Carats will make sure they stay that way!

author: @Arqamazraq
text: Jujur udah ga sanggup lagi sebenernya, gaada 1 hal pun yg berjalan sesuai apa yg gue mau dan gaada 1 org pun yg sudi buat bantu gue keluar dari masalah ini. Org rumah yg gue harap bisa jadi penopang justru malah jadi salah satu alasan terbesar gue buat pergi dari dunia ini. Gue bahkan terlalu pengecut buat ngakhirin hidup gue sendiri haha. Setiap hari gue cmn berdoa semoga gue cepet pergi. Rasanya kaya gelap bgt... gue gatau lg harus ngapain, apapun yg gue lakuin selalu salah. Sebanyak apapun gue berusaha ujungnya selalu sama. Ortu gue blg dia nyesel ngebesarin gue, kalo harus milih gue juga pengennya org se tolol dan segaberguna kaya gue emg harusnya cepet mati aja biar gajadi beban buat semua org.

text: I dislike myself for actively supporting them late. I've known them since 2016 but I did not activitely supported them. Nevertheless, I'm forever grateful for full on supporting them now. Like what other CARATs say, I found them and supported them at my lowest point. Who would've known that they would mean sooo much to me? No group made me feel this way. I felt genuine happiness that I haven't felt in a while from them. I wish them eternal happiness. As long as they are happy, I am also happy. SEVENTEEN is simply my happiness. author: @ddzq9525
text:
I keep coming to this song for comfort when life feels heavy when I need a good cry but can't cry( crying out makes me feel light so when I hold tears its very painful) from the last 3 years I have been in a vicious circle of self destruction I have been in a depressive phase in a toxic environment with my life not going anywhere completely lost my trust on myself but I am not going to lose the hope I am giving myself another chance I am forgiving myself for my past deeds and becoming a new person
Edit- I will keep coming to this song and read this whenever I lose my motivation for bettering myself hope one day me and my childhood self would be proud of myself

author: @deekayii
text: â€œyou never stan them late, you found them when you need badly need someoneâ€ this hit me like a brick, last year december. I am at my lowest point of my life, i don't know what to do i am lost, not until seventeen showed up in my fyp at tiktok and soon enough they felt like home and my comfort to me. They gave me strength to continue moving forward, they are the reason why i am still fighting for this life. They are so precious to me and i cherish them the most. So if another life ever exist, i want us to meet again and be my comfort and forever safe place.

author: @SyccRi
text:
I love how seventeen changed carats life in any kind of way. Most of us found them in our lowest, though i don't relate to it, they still somehow made my "normal" or "okay" life way better than it was before. 
Never once have i regretted getting into kpop from Seventeen. It's been 6 months they influenced my life, they changed my life. All i want to say all over again is thank you, for your hard work, for being you, for existing.
If we could born again and again, i'd love to stay with every carats and all 13 again. I adore you all.

I never regret choosing seventeen, I am emotionally attached to the point that they are the one I look for whenever I'm struggling. Thank you for your hard work! I can't wait to meet them on their next tour, fighting!!ğŸ’™ğŸ’—

author: @dalene1718
text: I've been over thinking a lot about how my future will turn out. The road is the rockiest path I'll have to face. This time, I'm alone. I have to start anew, I have to be strong. I have to be responsible. I have to be able to live it out on my own. I don't know if I can do it. I have all the help from my loved ones, but I don't know if they can keep helping me. I don't know how to help myself. I am lost. I am afraid. I don't know what to do. Still, thank you for the strength you give me, Seventeen. I hope you'll be with me through my rocky path.

Youâ€™ve grown a lot. I am always proud of all of you.

author: @jinpiphanyelmariajin32
text: I always say i regret not stanning them back when I first discovered them in 2017 during Don't Wanna Cry and then again in 2019 with Fear, but the truth is they came back to me when I needed them the most of all. It bugs me especially since I knew all of their names/who they were/watched their shows before actually becoming a carat. But if anything, it was all leading to this moment. Its really true that you find them exactly when you need them the most. its been about more than half a year since I became a carat yet it feels longer. I hope this feeling can stay for the rest of my life <3

I was reminded that seventeen will always be there for us, there music continue to heal me and reminds me how happy they made me. Thank you seventeen for coming to my life. Love and will forever cherish you.

author: @jinggabiruan
text:
Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

text: I don't have anything to say other than thanks for saving my life. We, carats, don't want you guys to overwork yourselves. Even if a day comes when we can't see each other(hope that it will never happen), if you guys are healthy and happy somewhere, we can move on with our lives with the thought the ones who saved my live are happy. Even though I can't go to your concert or buy your merch and by the age I earn money, you guys will not be here, just know that you have saved lives of many and you're our escape when life gets hard for us. Seventeen until Seventy!â¤

author: @airi1899
text: no words can express how much i am grateful to this group and how much I cherish them. this is not just about their music and performances, I think what struck me the most is how they are so relatable and inspiring. they don't just show us their success and happy moments, they are also showing us how normal it is to encounter obstacles in life. they show us how they love each other like a family, they show us how to work harder while at the same time telling us to take it easy. there's so much more than just their music and pretty faces, this group is everything life could offer. i am so thankful I found them when I needed them the most and they really saved me from drowning. gosh, rewatching this for the second time still gives me the same feels. FIGHTING, SEVENTEEN and CARATS!!!!

author: @eirenevalenia5449
text:
to my dearest friends, Meive and Anggel.

i hope someday you'll found this comment.

i just wanna say thank you for chose me as your friend.
thank you for always listen to my thoughts.
thank you for never let me go.

i know i have so many flaws.
i might be the worst.
but you guys still stand by me.

no matter how hard i try,
i kept on disappoint you both.

i'm sorry for everything that i've done.
i'm sorry for things i've said that might hurt you both.

especially meive,
i'm sorry for broke down my own promises to you.

i'll take whatever your decision is.

please keep in mind that i will always love you as my best friend.


you guys are the best thing that ever happened in my life.
thank you for coming and be the colors of my monochrome life.

whatever the path that we took,
you will always be my friend.
even in my next life, i'll choose to be your friend.

with love,

author: @mchllnstrll
text:
I'm so sorry for not being with you since day 1 and I really felt bad for that.
I felt so guilty why I only became Carat recently the mere fact that I started listening to your songs since left and right era unexpectedly.  
I'm an ARMY and now I'm a CARAT and I really believe in the saying that people will knock the door and come to you unexpectedly when you needed them the most for you to feel that you're not walking alone that you have them to give you light, comfort and happiness. 
BTS and SEVENTEEN gave me the feeling that I'm not alone. I have them until the end of my road. Thanking you is not enough but still I want to say THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU for everythingâ£ï¸

author: @hannazoeclavano8590
text:
i really feel sad that i won't be able to meet you guys this october:( and i know that in the next tour, I barely have a chance to do so because of personal reasons. You've been my home through the darkest of times. I'll always support you guys and love you even from afar, even without knowing my existence. I'll always be here admiring all your talent and personality to the point that you all became my happiness.
When things get heavy and unbearable, you've always made it lighter, whether through music or broadcast.
I know I will regret not seeing you guys personally this october and even on the next tours. I've always wanted to see you guys perform live and in real life but i guess it's not the time God wants me to. I have this little hope that even by the next 17 years, where you guys already found your happiness in life, we will meet. Even by simply going past each other. You guys mean so much to me to the point I'm ready to go all in, but I guess this is where I have to accept the fact that not everything goes to what I wanted it to be. And I hope that it was for our own good, even though I'm still not sure of the clear reason behind those.
Even after the last say the name, even after my fangirling phase, Seventeen will always have a special spot in my heart. And I'm sure of that. Mahal ko kayo:(

author: @cris.v975
text:
Knowing seventeen this late is one of my biggest regrets. TT I have been a carat for 3 months now and am still catching up with all those 8 years' worth of content and memories that you have built with each one of the members, and especially with the fans. I'll be walking alongside you from now on! I'm so proud of you, Seventeen! You deserve all the love you are getting from fans all over the world! We thank you for all the messages you have delivered to us through your music. We appreciate you and we love you!

Enjoy your BeTheSun world tour!

<3 , three-month old carat cris.v

author: @teya9148
text:
"whatever happens to us, we will meet again". 

i am writing this comment for all filo carats who have been through so much these past few monthsâ€” from a very stressful ticket selling, to frustrating happenings. to everyone who wasn't able to secure their tickets for BeTS in Manila, it's okay. although it's sad that we won't be able to see them this time, let's always remember that just like what's written in the lyrics, we will always find our way back to each other. we will meet them someday, whatever happens, whatever the circumstances may be. to everyone who secured their tickets, congratulations, guys. I'm so happy for all of you. please cheer loudly on the day of the concert. make the night memorable for them. you all deserve this chance to see them. 

filo carats, you all did well. I'm so proud of you guys. we have been through so much but you still held on. always and always for seventeen. let's meet them next time, shall we? for now, let's love them wholly, support them fully, and stay with them until the end. ğŸ’

text: No matter how many times i've listened to this song, I always, and WILL always cry. I joined the fandom during RWY and suddenly their "HIT THE ROAD" documentary movie popped up on my youtube. Now, seventeen has became my official safety zone and my resting space and I am so thankful to be able to encounter them in this life.

text: i have no one to talk to about this so iâ€™ll just talk here. for the past few weeks iâ€™ve been rehearsing hard for a performance iâ€™m really looking forward to. itâ€™s my first big performance on pointe, itâ€™s in front of a large audience, with a role i really enjoy and a cast i really love. but today, i received news that my dad is most likely covid-19 positive meaning i wonâ€™t be able to perform. i knew it was too good to be true, everything was perfect. so iâ€™ve just been praying and crying, trying to console myself. i came here for comfort, this song along with smile flower and hug have always comforted and gave me a shoulder when i needed it. thank you seventeen.

author: @en.novady
text:
Seventeen is my homeğŸ’— I'll be forever thankful that I stan this group since I was in my 1st year in highschool (i think that was months after you released adore u.) And now I'm an incoming 2nd year college student. (Lately, I've been struggling especially in acads. That's why I rewatch the hit the road vids and as well as listen to this song. Somehow, you guys are my inspiration. I admire your determination in everything you do. I love how passionate you are and how you express your love for other members and us,carats.)

I'm happy and proud where you are right now. Let's keep on shining, together. You all guys deserve to be happy. Pls take care of your health. I will always love seventeen. Thank you for everything!   You saved us in various ways. I hope and pray that I can someday witness some of your live performances but i think it's not happening this year. I badly want to attend this coming October. :(( I hope when I already have enough resources to see you guys, you're still there,complete as one groupğŸ¥º  I'll never get tired supporting you from a far. Stay strong because there's still a lot of years  for you guys. Keep on shining! Saranghae <33 

PS: LET'S KEEP ON STREAMING HOT MVğŸ”¥ WE GOT THIS!!ğŸ”¥

author: @twoteen6719
text:
Seventeen, aku takut banget ga bisa liat kalianğŸ’–
Takut banget kalo ternyata aku ga bisa nonton konser kalian. Padahal ini konser terakhir kalian semua lengkap. 
Aku percaya kalo another chance itu ada. Tapi gimana kalo ternyata ga ada? Aku pasti bakal nyesel banget. 
Kapan sih kalian bisa kumpul 13 orang, lengkap lagi? Itu masih bertahun-tahun. Lamaaaa banget. Karna itu aku pengen banget bisa nonton konser kalian kali ini<3
Tapi keadaanku ga begitu mendukung. 
Aku sekarang berusaha ngumpulin uangku buat ketemu kalian, tapi aku ga yakin aku bisa. 
Aku berdoa tiap hari supaya bisa pergi ke konser kalian kali ini. Bisa ketemu kalian. Setiap hari aku berdoa, tanpa ada satu hari pun terlewat. Kata orang kalo doa diulang ulang pasti dikabulkan. Bismillah. 


Nulis ini jadi mellow banget huhuhu:((
Tadinya mau nulis pendek aja, eh ternyata jadi sepanjang ini. Pengen banget ketemu sebong ğŸ’–ğŸ’™
Semoga carats bisa ke konser seventeen be the sun... 
Aamiin

author: @jldump4668
text: So why am I here? Ah we lost two times today. From Idol champ to Mcountdown, it was freaking exhausting. And here I am listening in this masterpiece, comforting me. It was literally us again. It was us when something go wrong but then again I am not alone. For the past few weeks since the release of Face the sun; Hot I was there giving my all. A weeks of sleepless night, my body ached so much that sometimes I can't handle. A weeks of giving Seventeen what they truly deserve. A weeks of streaming, voting, hyping the tl and so on. Why am I doing this in the first place? Ah because I want to be a Carat who truly gives meaning of my name which is Carat, the one who gives shine of Seventeen. They will always be my favorite escape in this tiring world. So we lost but we'll never give up. It's for Seventeen after all.

author: @ai-tn5wd
text:
writing this in one of the most stressful time in life. this song makes me remember that i have been with them for a long time. theyve been part of my teenage years and it felt like we grew together. i am now on my path to pursue my future career... although i am still not sure where life will really take me, it is very reassuring that there is a song that i can listen to that tells me that in the end, it is going to be okay. 

even though i am not as updated or active in fangirling as much as i used to be before, i cant help but keep coming back to where i felt safe and loved. this song hurts my heart in a very good way, i am so thankful to have known seventeen in my life. i wish i could see them again live before i die or before the world ends cz last time was 2017 lol... anways

thank you seventeen for giving us wonderful music everytime. weve been through a lot together. ive never been so proud as a carat to see you guys grow to be someone who is respected in the industry. you all deserve the recognition... seventeen and carats.. fightingg!

author: @wonder2-track10
text:
Wrote this when I was stable enough.
I entered this fandom in 2017, I went through a lot with SEVENTEEN. From the point which I was a sixth grader to this, a highschooler. The journey I walked with them was so long, I can't see the end. Until my crisis breaks out in 2020, I wouldn't bother being alive, let alone SEVENTEEN. That's when my adoration for them eroded. Two years without SEVENTEEN, I felt so alone in this big wide world. I forgot how to laugh genuinely and get my heart moved by somebody. I thought I would never deserve loving SEVENTEEN, but then I listened to this song in Feb 2022. I cried so much. It had been a long time since I last felt something "real" like that. Not gonna lie, Smile Flower was my dose of healing back then. Now, ìš°ë¦¬, ë‹¤ì‹œ is my life savior and my safe place. I'm so thankful of SEVENTEEN making it known to CARATs that they are by their side, they are the shoulders for them to cry on. 
SEVENTEEN meant a world to me in 2017, it has not changed. They are my querencia. They taught me to always be determined in what I am doing. Hoshi taught me not to live up to others' expectations but to my own (He said this in the Diamond Edge concert) I will forever cherish this love I receive from them. It is not just about music, having an idol. It is having someone who is sympathetic and support you on your path of life.
Thank you SEVENTEEN.

author: @gabrielleedwards949
text: Seventeen is the only group/artist, kpop or otherwise, that I know will stay with me forever. There is a comfort and beauty in their songs and I am able to try again. They are the ones that push me to be better, to be happy. I found Seventeen at a low point where I was not very motivated not just in work but in life also. Then they released Clap which was my very first comeback with them. It lifted me up and although it is not a sad song I cry whenever I listen to it. Seventeen's vocal and lyrics never cease to pass me. That is why I say that I will be a carat forever. They have made such a monumental positive impact I am unable to forget. Til I am gone, Say the name....SeventeenğŸ’ğŸ’—

author: @clairecatchan6813
text: coming back here again, since I'm feeling unalive the past few days...seventeen might not be my first ultimate group but they have a precious place in my heart, ever since I stan them and bts I feel safe and secured. They make me feel that my feeling was worth it and valid. hearing this song again, brings me back in being motivated and confident person. Seventeen and bts brings the best version of myself, they help me realized that I'm worth living for, that no matter how many people will drag me down no one will ever break my heart and soul, I will always stand and stand to fight for myself, to fight for my feelings and to fight to what is right...svt and bts was worth to stan, they are not just a group, but a family that will treat you in the bestest way they can and in a fantastic way you want to. Svt and bts are the most special gift I've ever received...

author: @jinggabiruan
text:
Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoy

text: Didnt know it was possible for me to have love for 13 strangers but now almost a year into the diamond life I completely understand. They have helped me when I was coming out of a dark stage in my life. The pandemic took a toll on my mental health. They helped restore happiness back to me. Now especially when I hear songs like this, Hug or Smile Flower I can't stop crying. They truly have a special place in us Carats hearts and nothing can replace them. Im so thankful and grateful that God allowed me to find them I  literally dont know how to express it enough.

author: @reinsunny728
text: Saya tidak punya banyak alasan untuk bertahan. Beberapa kali meraba, pegangan yang tidak pernah ditujukan kepada saya runtuh juga. Saya merasa segalanya tidak mungkin, dan berusaha adalah sia-sia. Tapi hari ini saya membuka video anda, album anda setelah pembaharuan kontrak terlaksana. Saya melihat senyum anda, saya melihat sorot mata anda, saya melihat air mata bahagia anda. Rasanya ini terlalu awal untuk menyerah bukan? Meski bukan untuk diperlihatkan pada dunia, dipersembahkan kepada orang tercinta. Tapi diri saya sendiri lebih dari apapun. Saya berjanji tidak akan menyerah sampai saya bisa menghargai diri saya sendiri, mempercayai, juga menyayangi apa yang selama ini sempat saya ragukan.

author: @iamgh0st
text: Cuando saliÃ³ esta canciÃ³n, llevaba unos pocos meses siendo carat y en serio llorÃ© en toda la canciÃ³n, nunca me sentÃ­ asÃ­ por ningÃºn grupo, nunca e querido un grupo asÃ­ de fuerte como con seventeen, nunca voy a querer a un grupo como los quiero a ellos, puedo amar y apoyar a muchos pero seventeen....seventeen para mi son lo mejor que a pasado en mi vida, me han dado alegrÃ­a cuando me siento mal, me transmiten mÃ¡s energÃ­a aunque ya lo estÃ© y tengo el doble, me dan las fuerzas de que puedo cumplir mis metas si trabajo duro y no me rindo nunca, de que siempre hay una salida para todo, que siempre estarÃ¡n conmigo....en serio muchas gracias, nunca e querido a nadie asÃ­, en serio ustedes son tan especiales, puedo vivir al otro lado del mundo pero en serio, muchas gracias por todo, se los agradezco de corazÃ³n, yo no entiendo como puedo amar a personas que "no conozco" y tampoco ellos a mi pero me paso con estos chicos, en serio, gracias por hacer mi vida con mÃ¡s sentido y mÃ¡s feliz, gracias por estar conmigo cuando lo necesite, gracias por todo seventeen,  los amo mucho~â™¡

text:
I have just been a carat last november 2021 and reaching this song after watching all of the shows and performance that can let me introduced to them to know them deeper, I realized that I finally found my home.

I hope to meet the 13 of you once this pandemic is over. I have never been into any kpop concerts eventhough I have been an exo-l for 9 yrs because I am just always happy supporting their music and everything they do, but with these boys, I feel like I have to see them once in my life. 

I feel like Iâ€™ve met my soulmates in this lifetime.
Supporting you feels like home. Thank you for coming into my life, Seventeen. ğŸ¤

author: @monolyptic
text:
Just wanna share something here. No need to read this, but if u want go ahead ^^
This is sort of a heavy topic so

My 2021 wasn't very good at all. Been having extreme burnouts in online classes, and for my last year in Junior High School, I had to move schools. It was way different than my previous school which overwhelmed me (and again, this was online classes-)

Though I still had my friends (I love them so much. Still with me up to now â¤ï¸), it was very tough, and it was hard to try and reach out to my classmates and ask for guidance from the teachers.

I've attempted twice. It feels so scary, but still I'm trying my best to graduate and move up.

I watch their GoSe episodes when I just needed to feel happiness, even if it was for a short time. I listen to their songs: songs like Left & Right, Lucky, Call Call Call, and more to make me feel hype and active while working, or songs like To You, Hug, Come to Me, and more to comfort me when I'm at my lowest.

And to Carats, too. From funny comments you guys make and edits of our boys made by ya'll just made me happy. Thank you so much.

With this, I will do my best to continue. Currently, I'm about to enter 3rd Quarter of my school year (trying to finish any missed tasks and projects in 2nd quarter for this and next week).

A big thank you to Seventeen for comforting me whenever I felt very lonely, and for showing me that there are many things waiting for me in the future even if there are problems that try to stop me, I'll fight back. I'm glad to be in this family. I love you, Seventeen and Carats.

'Till the last "Say the name!" â¤ï¸ğŸ’

author: @wonwoosbokdeongeori3191
text:
To loudrats...





Thank you for being part of my life. Thank you for all the wishes , y'all mean a lot to me. Let's stay the same for coming years too. Whenever I'm free I immediately rush to talk to u guys because y'all the only ones I can show my real self without being called k-pop obsessed (pfft). I know there's been ups and downs in our friendship with eachother which is common in all kind of real friendship. If I have hurted anyone indirectly sorry;) . Let's start 2022 by still holding this friendship. Let's all hope to meet face to face somewhere in the future, let's have our own one fine day, gose and debate night especially hahaha ğŸ˜­the fact that we all are from different countries but found love, care, peace with eachother makes it look like destiny (major thanks to our boys seventeenâœ¨). I wish u all have a successfully and prosperous career in life too

Let's all aim for our dreams and make it come true "gosh I sound old"
 I really love u guys so much
Thanks again 
 (y'all hear me say this word only this time ğŸ‘€)

Btw this song mean a lot to me .as a carats, as a member of loudrats,
That's why I chose to send my para here..

And 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY SASA

author: @applepie980
text:
you know, it's kinda weird but i realized that seventeen is already a group that's considered to be an older group now.. seeing a lot of newer groups covering their songs, hearing trainees practicing their songs, looking back at all the accomplishments they had achieved, and the fact that they are reaching their 7th year, also i think (?) we are going to start to see some of the members going to the military starting maybe the next two-fourth years.. when you think about it, it's kind of interesting(?) idk. maybe there's going to be a time where they're not as active as now, a time where they have more solo activities than group activities,  a time where carats look back on their older songs and listen to them.. But when that time comes, I think carats will always be there for seventeen. Cheering them on and supporting them..
I hope seventeen and carats will always be happy and healthy <3 love u guys


note: sorry guys if it's kinda emotional, it's just a thought that came up while listening to this :')

author: @miseree1164
text: This song makes me cry because I'm really having a hard time right now. I'm a student nurse who is struggling and don't know what to do I'm anxious of everything. I'm tired, I'm drained and etc. I don't feel doing anything these days esp today, but luckily I'm a carat and I watched HTR and listened to this song to cope up with everything & when that part came "Whenever you feel lost, come to me." it made me really cried and those message of every member at the end of their documentary gave motivation. Thank you so much SVT for coming to my life. Even if life is tough I'm happy that you're there to make me at ease. You all said that Carats give you strength however you don't know how much strength and motivation you are giving to us. Thank you so much for existing in our lives SEVENTEEN. You indeed play a big role in my life, our lives. SEVENTEEN FIGHTING!

Us, Again (Romanized)

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok

Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo

Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja

Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

text: I have never want to rely on anyone or anything to find my happiness but somehow when everytime i comeback to svt they gave me all this happiness and comfort that im not even looking for. been a  carat since early 2016 and never regretted my decision to stan them. i do understand what other carat said about them being our "home" where we feel calm, comfort and happy :) thank you for all the laughter, happiness, comfort we've gotten from you guys. I  really cherish their friendship and hope they will lasts forever :)

author: @aheartthatsbrokeisaheartth9723
text:
The word Disband Scares Us But at the same time I want them to live their own lives without a camera following them around, getting married with their love, having children, being grandparents...hehe That went too far 
Although it hurts me...and I am sure I will miss them...But still I want them to live their life for themselves...
All I request is not to disband, just hiatus or something like that, where they can spend their time and also appear on vlive when they want to.
 ALL I WANT IS A VLIVE ONCE IN A YEAR AND I AM HAPPY FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE.
AS EXPECTED, I still cant imagine my life with out seventeen 
I ALSO HOPE THAT ALL CARATS WONT BE AGAINST THEM DATING?? RIGHT?? 
I BELIEVE IN US, AGAIN

text:
I think that sometimes seungcheol, jeonghan, jisoo, junhui, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, minghao, mingyu, dokyeom, seungkwan, hansol and chan visited this comment section..Do you think so Carat??
I will always remember on 31 October 2021 we were lost in music shows two rows...then the whole CARATLAND apologize to them and felt guilty..everyone felt down and sad after see the members reaction on that stage..inkigayo right?? 
Then,they come to Weverse..Hoshi still thanking to us..Vernon with his words..and our GENERAL SVT CARAT LEADER ..coups said that TO THEM IS CARAT and CARAT IS TO SEVENTEEN...I started to make a flood under my eyes..will always be loved with this family

author: @yena7978
text:
this is a story (?) i want to share with whoever reads this, (sorry in advance for any bad wording)

april 2020 was an extremely hard month for me. i was in lockdown with no way to meet with my friends and i decided to stop talking to them for a while as i felt i needed to. during that time i felt really alone and sad. there was a lot of stress on me and i cried almost every night feeling as if i had no one. i even spent my birthday alone and cried almost all day. fast forward to september 2021 (now) i am currently in another lockdown and i cant meet my friends at all and have taken another break from them. however, this time is different. last year i didnt know about seventeen but now i do. the only difference from now and last year is that i dont feel that lonely. the message that ìš°ë¦¬, ë‹¤ì‹œ gives is really comforting and makes me feel less alone. its given me the courage to come back to talking to my friends even if its through text and calls. i know this is a bit embarrassing to say but i really am grateful iâ€™ve met seventeen.

to all carats who are going through something tough in life or during hard times like now please know that you should stay strong and as the song says, 

*â€™the warmth and warm smiles at the end of the road will protect us from the time quickly passing by usâ€™*

author: @melissaa.4189
text:
I'm a type of person who rarely ask for help. I am someone who don't know how to ask for help or comfort. All I have that comforts me are songs, novels, and my art. I know this might sound overdramatic but this song just somehow give me assurance that I can live my life in my own pace in this bustling life, especially college seems so scary and difficult and my future and goals seems distant and blurry. Seventeen, thank you for reminding me to walk our journey in our own pace. Thank you for comforting me with this song. You may not be with our side every time but because of your songs, we can feel the warmth and won't feel alone, especially at the times where we are at our lowest point. Thank you for existing! And all I ask for you to do, just like any other carats, is to live happily, follow where your heart is at peace and always take care of yourselves! Someday, may our paths cross and share a wonderful memories. Until then, I need to study hard first!

To everyone out there, I hope this song will comfort you, especially at your darkest times. I hope you find time to rest and have someone to guide and be there for you! I hope you'll have a time to breathe and appreciate the people and the little things around you. Hoping you, the one who is reading this, have a blessed day ahead! Stay safe everyone!

author: @Maria-tg9ss
text:
Seventeen Â¿QuÃ© es seventeen para mi? Ustedes no son solamente mis Ã­dolos, esta conexiÃ³n va mÃ¡s allÃ¡ de eso; Seventeen es mi vida, mi alegrÃ­a, ustedes me han ayudado demasiado y se que siempre estarÃ¡n ahÃ­ para mÃ­, por ustedes me levanto mis queridos, ustedes son mis compaÃ±eros, mis amigos, las personas que me hacen feliz y los que me recuerdan que todo va a estar bien pasÃ© lo que pasÃ© , estoy tan agradecida con ustedes chicos, y como ustedes lo dicen con un simple gracias no basta, esa palabra tan sencilla quiero que suene sincera, muchÃ­simas gracias por estar conmigo y por haberme permitido conocerlos y amarlos. Me hacen feliz, espero y nunca alejarme de ustedes, me de un terror el solo pensar que eso podrÃ­a pasar alguna vez y de nuevo estÃ¡n ustedes deseando que nunca sienta eso, que solo sea feliz y claro que lo soy con ustedes chicos.
Espero que tengan buena salud, les deseo felicidad plena y ustedes pueden superar todo porque recuerden que CARAT siempre estarÃ¡ a su lado, aquÃ­ tendrÃ¡n hombros de apoyo y oÃ­dos de sobra que los escucharÃ¡n aÃºn si la distancia es muy larga o la nacionalidad no es la misma, eso no es lo importante porque lo que nos une son nuestros corazones.
Los amo demasiado chicos, ustedes son los 13 diamantes que alumbran mi vida, mis diamantes, gracias por existirğŸ’
Y aunque se que existen pocas posibilidades de que lean mi comentario quiero que sepan que lo escribÃ­ con mucha sinceridad, gracias por estar conmigoâ¤ï¸
Como ustedes lo dijeron "Aunque estemos tambaleando sobre las olas, llegarÃ¡ el dÃ­a en que caminemos sobre ellas" asÃ­ que sigamos fuertes, apoyandonos unos a otros, siempre juntos.

author: @caratdul710
text: i was trying to cry because of the pain. I just physically cant. while i was listening to joji's "will he", seventeen sent a notification of a video posted here on yt as joji sang, "i just wanna make sure ure ok". There, i'm crying like a baby. I am still. For some reason, seventeen just manages their way when im down. at times i can't function, at times i doubt myself. I can't express how thankful i am  for them, always being there. They manage to always make me cry even for the littlest things because im deeply grateful for them. It's been a year since a started to stan them, and it was one of the best decisions i've ever made. I've never felt alone. I didn't think I'll be into kpop but here i am, thanking them with all my heart. Thanking them because i might have been long gone if it wasn't for them. They kept me sane. Thank you so much. You mean a lot to me, and I'll be with you the rest of the way! Until after the last say the name!!!

To Jeonghan, our love, our light.
To Joshua, our heart, our gentleness.
To Jun, our fun, our energy.
To Hoshi, our laughter, our tiger.
To Wonwoo, our calmness, our cornerstone.
To Woozi, our creativity, our fuel.
To Dokyeom, our happiness, our laughter.
To Mingyu, our intelligence, our love.
To The8, our reality, our maturity.
To Seungkwan, our jokes, our brightness, our gold.
To Vernon, our humbleness, our rest.
To Dino, our perseverence, our determination.
To Seventeen, our home, our family.
To Carats, our diamonds.

Thank you for 6 years worth of love and light. Here's to so, so many more. OT13 Forever!

text: coming back here because these boys had renewed their contract today and I can't help but to cry and admire their friendship! Tbh, I just want them all to be together and be able to make music that makes them happy! I can finally sleep at ease and continue to support these lovely 13 diamonds 'till the end. I'm always praying for sebongs' happiness and good health.

author: @whatinthedora
text:
"Whenever you feel lost, come to me.
By sharing the warmth,
 We can find the way again.
No need to be afraid 
The warmth and warm smiles at the end of the road,
Will protect us from the time quickly passing by us.
You can slow down a bit
Still, we will meet again."

These lyrics hit me hard made me cry. And I can't tell you how grateful I am to seventeen for making this song. Cause all these time, those were the words that I needed the most. That whenever I'm lost, I can come to them, and that all of the pain that I'm dealing with rn will eventually heal, and that I can slow down if I'm tired without feeling afraid because at the end of the road there will be someone waiting for me. 
Seventeen THANK YOU SO MUCH. YOU just inspired another person. Because of you I will be stronger and I will continue my journey without feeling afraid.

author: @carat-ns2qv
text:
(I wanted to write this here. Maybe sebongie can see it. My eng is not good:')
HELLO >.< seventeen ~
I  became a fan of yours when I was 14 years old. Now I'm 20 he he.I literally grow up with you guys.Every one of you have thought me something. Now I'm in law departmet(I just wanted to say it ). I'm so happy that I met with you when I was young.Oh and I am only a carat.I started to like k -pop with you and from then I only liked you.It's really interesting to me because I can't like/love something/someone this long.I have been a carat for 6 years already. Although there were certain difficulties of being fan,It was a beautiful journey. My only wish for now is svt's happiness and health. I'm happy when svt happy,I'm upset when svt upset...Before I die I want to see you guys and talk to face to face.(it's my second wishâ¤)
I know that you probably won't see this but I wanted to write this. Oh and thanks to you guys I learned Korean hahah I didn't go to any course.Just because I wanted to understand you, I learned Korean and hangul ~^.^~
I'm not good with words :') I respect and love you guys from my heart.

Thank you for everythingâ¤

text: I'm back again cause I feel so empty at the moment, I don't know what to do anymore nothing makes me feel good apart from music, apart from kpop and seventeen. I'm trying so hard but why can't I ever get it right, why can't I ever get what I want, why am I never good enough. I'm trying so hard to believe that it'll get better. I wish time could stop so I could take a break, I don't want to grow up anymore I want to stay here and not worry about the future and not worry about everything that goes through my head. I just want to watch seventeen gose and listen to their healing music. Thank you seventeen, thank you for being my family and my happiness in this time, thank you so so much I love you all

author: @nurshuhada2075
text:
I am a very cheerful kid. I can be a hyperactive kid, outside. inside, I'm a depressed kid. this side of mine that nobody knows in the first place. when I try to open up, they say I'm an attention seeker. that was when I found Seventeen. they comfort me, cheer me up like nobody else. they help me till this day. I hate when they say staning Seventeen just wasting my time. they make me know the side that I don't even know.
THANK YOU SEVENTEEN
WE, CARAT WILL STAY BY YOUR SIDE
LOVE  YOU,
CARAT

author: @annonymouss7
text:
Dear Seventeen, thank you for this beautiful song that strengthen me through the hardest part of my life, even for many people. Keep inspiring many people for a long time. We'll also be here to cheer y'all. 
Thank you once again.

I love you to the moon and never back!

Seventeen boleh aku curhat?
Baru aja aku dapet kabar nilai ulangan aku jelek. Aku kecewa sama diri sendiri. Aku janji buat jd orang sukses dan ketemu kalian. Aku udah ngelakuin sebisaku. Tapi kalo emang ini hasilnya aku bisa apa. Maaf kalo kalian kecewaã… ã… 

Aku ke sini buat ngehibur diri aku tapi malah tambah sedih. Tolong tunggu aku. Tolong terus bareng" biar bisa ngehibur aku. Buat aku bangkit lagi. Aku janji buat berusaha ketemu kalian. Maafin aku. Love you

text:
I eventually started watching k-pop because of BTS like most of the international k-pop listeners but slowly when I started watching more and more and suddenly got to know about svt. At first I was not at all interested in seventeen I regret that now I don't have any idea why I kept ignoring them but when one day I was just sitting and was wondering what to do and was scrolling YouTube suddenly they pop up and trust me I am in love with them the hardship they faced they're

author: @hudapizza7917
text:
Im typing this as of 3:02am because Ive been crying rn.
Thinking of them d!sb@nding makes this song hit so hard.
Seventeen is carats' home; and we are to them.
I dont want to lose our home.
I hope everything is fine behind the camera.
I hope theyre doing fine. that they are happy. that they can still rest properly.
especially now with what's happening with the promotion for their cb. 
I can't help but worried for them and their health. 
It also doesn't help the fact that they are near to contract renewal.
I hope we can still be together after 7 years. 
Please hold on to them. they're doing their best.
let's meet them soon with a good heart when they come back.

author: @deandrapb
text:
[Romanized:]

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae

author: @pkplays2557
text:
No matter what we are facing now with the company, whatever problems us carats have with hybe labels, whatever anger we have towards the company, let's come back to this song, and remember that we are a family, seventeen plus carats, together. 
Remember hit the road, remember how they shared their happy and sad moments with us, remember how they were always there for us. 
And we should remember to be there for them too. I'm angry because of what hybe labels did, but let's be there for them, like they were for us and continue supporting them. I think that's what would make them the happiest now, their fans constant support.

Carats, fighting!!

author: @beautifuldawn1477
text:
Isn't it crazy how this could also be a song for yourself too?

For someone who has lost their way while going through this life and figuring out this life and I feel like I lost myself too through out the process. Some of the lyrics really just speaks to me and it hits home because this song is very reassuring and comforting and it gives me so much HOPE. 

it's as if they're saying "It's okay to get lost while you figure your life out, it's okay to not having it all figured out because no one does, it's okay to be tired, and it's okay to rest too. Never forget there are going to be people cheering you on while you walk a certain path and when you reach the end of the road surely you'll never be alone, cos people will celebrate with you, protect you, and love you. You'll get to stand on the shaking wave someday, don't lose hope."

Seriously couldn't be more thankful to Seventeen for releasing such a masterpiece with a beautiful message you can live with forever. Super proud to be a Carat.

author: @woozil0vr
text: Thank you seventeen/carats for being my family. Thank you for being their for me when no one else was. I'm not doing well at the moment but listening to seventeen music helps me so much. I've never felt this close to a group before, so many things have gone wrong these past few months. Idk what to do, my family is falling apart, my family has no idea who I really am and they may never even except the person I truly am. I feel so alone in these times. But ik seventeen and carats are always with me. Ive never know a kpop group to be such a family before, I'm glad that I can call carats and seventeen my family. Thank you so much, thank you so so much

author: @yasnagonzalezsanchez
text:
I didn't want to hear this song until I WILL feel a true carat and have finished Hit the road.... Oh man, was a good and bad idea at the same time... Before the pandemic started I was struggling with big mental issues and anxiety... then the pandemic came ... I had to treat myself. I learned to ask for help... and Just during the time I was starting to get on my feet I saw that home; run had released. At that time I wasn't a carat but I have always love seventeen music as a normal listener of good music. My best friend was a carat that's how I knew them. But, during the pandemic, I started to listen to old music... Music that I used to listen to in the past ...one  OF THE ALBUM, Love and letter and DWC, BOOM BOOM. I remember that there was a show of their debut and I decided to watch it. I watched 17project ...best decision in my life ever <3 From then, I did my best to watch every content in a chronological way ajaj because I had missed so many .... I always think that I regret haven't stand them before, from the moment that I knew them... but at the same time, I'm thankful that I reunite with them In my bad moment because hearing don't listen in secret on my therapy was the most beauutiful moment as a carat for me. 
LOVE FOR ALL THE  CARAT OUT THERE I LOVE YOU ! WE ARE A FAMILY <3

author: @orangetigre6267
text:
[Romanized:]

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

author: @theloyallemon4918
text:
I dont get it, i really tried this time but i still failed. When will i make myself proud? When will i make my parents proud? It just so hard, i feel like i get used to suffering. I really put all of my effort and hardwork this time, but i failed. I started to think im a failure even though my mind said im not. But the reality, i am

The biggest pain is no one beside me when im at my lowest point, not even my family, friends, myself. I can't find myself in me. Im lost

Im so sorry for telling this here, i feel so bad i cant tell this to anyone. Tonight, its not hurt as usual, but i just lost hope to everything. I think i will never be someone who i wanna be

author: @siaknics
text:
That "After the tough and tiring journey, we shall meet each other." hits differently, especially to international fans. Seventeen's world tour is the only thing I am looking forward to each year, yet, covid-19 took away that opportunity wherein I can rest, have fun, cry with them and forget all of my problems, even just for a while. I still don't know when will all of these stop (especially in the Philippines), but as promised, we'll see each other after this long and tiring journey. 

Padayon, Seventeen.

author: @caratpetal6219
text:
Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

[English translation:]

You can walk comfortably
Someday I'll make a path for you
Even though I'm shaking on the waves
One day, we're gonna have a lot of waves

On a strange road
Anyone can get lost
I'll be with you on the tough road

Until the day we sing together again
This road to you will not be over
For every reason and this length
You're the one that's beautiful
At the end of this road, after the turning point
So that you don't get tired anymore, I'll
I'll protect you
No matter what happens, we
We'll see you again

When you walk in the dark night
Don't do it yourself, I'm here
Bright light seeps in, it brightens the darkness

We sing together again, until that day
This path to you will never end
For every reason and this length
You're the one that's beautiful

After the end of this victory and the halfway point
Don't get tired anymore, I'll
I'll protect you
No matter what happens, we
We'll see each other again
Let's take a breath for awhile and then we'll go back
The hard, kept journey
Finish it and Pace us

Before the morning came then
We're at our peak
It's growing up
Come to me, if you're lost, any time

When you share warm warmth, the road comes back
We'll find it, you don't have to be scared
At the end of this road, there's warmth and a warm smile
They'll protect us in the past-paced hours
Let's slow down for a while
We'll see each other again

author: @Warm_Winter_Nights
text: If I've reviewed it enough, I noticed something. While rewatching Hit The Road and rereading the words at the end of each episode, if you rearrange the order of the phrases from the documentary, they form the lyrics of this song. It's such a large detail that no one noticed until now (I don't think) and it just goes to show how creative SEVENTEEN truly is.

author: @Warm_Winter_Nights
text: If Iâ€™ve looked it over enough, I realized something while I was rewatching Hit The Road. If you look at the lyrics of Us, Again and the phrases at the end of the separate episodes, they matched up pretty similarly, like a paraphrased version of the words

author: @abirdnotaturkey.386
text:
I also remember, back when this song was released, I thought it was a really nice song and all, but i didn't have the same feelings whilst listening to it. I think it was because I was still a new carat....I hadn't experienced the FEELING of being a true carat because i was still being introduced to a bunch of new stuff, that's why I heard this and I go 'yea its nice.' BUT NOW....hah! Don't even get me started, i struggle to explain that indescribable feeling of love, gratitude and happiness and so much other stuff!! ugh as always, I'm bawling by this point, I'm not really sure how I get to the end  of a single comment....overall, i'd say noncarats or people who don't know seventeen would never be able to experience the true feeling and meaning of this song; its only a bond between seventeen and us :)) carats, i just want to let you know: we've worked hard to support seventeen, ignoring all the haters along the way, let's make seventeen proud because we are not an ordinary fandom; we are a familyyy <3333
Till the last say the name ;( 17!

author: @hoshitmykimbap8840
text:
I met SEVENTEEN during the most happiest year I had. However after that, everything started falling apart. I had no support except myself and SEVENTEEN'S music. Their music is my virtual hug, the one whom I leaned on when no one was there for me. Who says only slow melody songs can provide comfort? Even SEVENTEEN'S most cheerful songs can help you stress relieve and forget about reality. And another gift I received when stanning SEVENTEEN is meeting carat friends - those who share the same interest as me, accepts me for me and along with SEVENTEEN, they became my recent support and I'd like to thank the boys for allowing me to meet such wonderful people. 

The path SEVENTEEN is going through is not easy but I will always remain here since they're the ones who was and will always be there for me during hard times.

Weird to say this but idk what I'd do without SEVENTEEN...

Ot13 until the end. â™¡

author: @hellokitty11264
text:
Where are they? They are fine, right?

I write this from the bottom of my heart, while I cry.

I do not even know how to write this, you have changed my life in such a magical way and everything I feel for you would not be understood by anyone but me, you do not know how much it affects me if something happens to you, with you I form an unbreakable bond, this hurts a lot, I swear to you that I try to be strong for you but my emotions are stronger now, that my heart is withering right now, sorry if I disappointed you.

I wish very much now that you continue for more years together, you and carat, you do not know how much I love you and I have a lot of affection and admiration for you, they are my little rays of sunshine â˜€ each one of you, I feel really bad.

I know you are not going to read it but I want to tell you that you cannot forget the years in which I have been with you from one moment to another and I do not want that to happen. I don't stop thinking about you for a minute and it hurts me a lot, not being able to hug you when I see you, when I think about you... your absence hurts me too much and I don't know if I will be able to endure this agony. So many emotions in so few days I realized who is staying and who is leaving, you have been there, to support me in some way, you may not know how, but you have, and I do not want to erase anything from my memories that I have made with you on this long journey, where I have seen you cry, laugh, fall and get up.

I will never regret having met you, maybe it was destiny to run into you on the way.  You are the source of my happiness, the joy of my gray days that have turned rainbows, the salty tears that I had shed long before meeting you had become sweet over time thanks to you.  You, you are my comfort zone, you don't know how much I miss you now.  I just want you to tell me that everything will be okay.  ğŸ’—

 I want you to be happy, as I have been.  ğŸ˜­ğŸ’— Sorry for so little and thanks for everything.

author: @leuerx
text:
i'm at the point where it's time for me to grow up and be an adult, struggling in a phase of my life, and seeing other people accomplish something when we were the same age is making me sad. Always wondering 'why don't i accomplish something like them? why can't i do that?' 
listening to this song really brings me comfort, to slow down on my journey, take a breather and keep going because at the end of the road there are people waiting for me with a warm smile on their face. Thank you for making a song with such a meaningful words, and give people like me a comfort to keep going on my journey, thank you so much <3

author: @alyaramadhani7000
text:
lyric /streaming with memorize


Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya
