author: @AiniMunir45
text:
As a Muslim like me, we should not be obsessed with sick things because it will make us forget who the creator is but in religion we are allowed to spend time with our own entertainment. And this is my own entertainment to appreciate the seventeen songs and appreciate their hard work, honestly I really like the seventeen because they always make me feel happy all the time, their crazy antics keep me entertained in my time even if they will not once knew me as I knew them all.

Yes, of course I really like their song, it can be said that every time the song seventeen is what I will listen to when I do a job, but still our religion does not recommend it because this matter is very obsessed with us because we have to pray a lot to our creator but I will try not to get too sick with this kpop world, in my religion we need to pray more to our creator and I hope my other Muslim friends are also not too obsessed with this kpop world because it will damage our faith, so I beg to you to be modest in this kpop world.

I became a fan of them when I was in high school, but not too hard at the time and in my school not many people knew seventeen because at that time many of my friends really liked bts. At that time I was quite interested in bts their song i was also very quiet to listen to. Don't get me wrong I never hated bts because they are very talented people, but when i entered university i became a hardcore fan of seventeen because my heart always felt entertained by their crazy and funny attitude.

Not only that their songs, their hard work and their enthusiasm in the group made me feel like I wanted to support them very hard. And I see one by one they grow from being a teenage boy until they become a very passionate man to do the best for their own fans.

I hope you do not quickly punish me just because of my religion, I am also a human being who wants to find pleasure and happiness in my life by listening to their songs when I feel bored. And I will always support them until the last say the name seventeen !!!.

To every carat who read this. Even we don't know each other, lets stay together, forever, with seventeen. Let's love seventeen forever and support them. AND ONE THINGâ€™S FOR SURE, Iâ€™LL NEVER REGRET CHOOSING SEVENTEEN ALL OVER AGAIN.

author: @mndlisa
text:
"It's okay, 
cry even if you don't know exactly what you're crying for. 
Sometimes we're just too tired of many things. 
Of being strong for too long. 
Of wandering too far, of carrying things all by ourselves
and not being able to come back home. 

But also know, sometimes it's just alright to be too tired because sometimes it means you did and kept doing the right things. 
It's just it did not end as early as you expected it to, or too much more than you thought you could handle.
But sooner or later you'll see things get better. And all that will remain to you is pride."
- Jericho Silvers 

This song as well as this quote has helped me a lot getting through this tough time, and  thought anyone might need this.

author: @sakinarazak3884
text:
Here am i again for the nth time listening to us again. I'll never get tired of this. It reminds me a lot of the times i was working really hard for my finals to finish medschool. It was hard and i was so tired. I cried listening to this song everytime but it never failed to get me geared up to the finish line. Seventeen really is my healing and my rock <3 It also reminds me that i will part ways with my bestfriends of 5 years and no matter what happens, we will see each other again :") 

Ah why am i being so emotional T.T

author: @wonuissweet8224
text: Me having an advance emotional hour here everyday even before the real concert, tho I won't be able to attend I know that everyone will cry listening to Us, again, it's not because of us again being a sad song but it's because it's a comfort song, a healing song that touches your wounds, you who had a sad day came here to seek for comfort right? and I know the lyrics delivered it, so after listening to this go back with a positive attitude and smile abit hehe and know that your not the only one having a bad day :")) it's _us_ having a bad day and once _again_ this song has healed me and you.

author: @febi5087
text:
"Us, Again (ìš°ë¦¬, ë‹¤ì‹œ)"

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

author: @gunwookcore
text:
nega pyeonhi geol-eul su issdolog
eonjenga neol-wihan gil-eul mandeul-eo julgeoya
pado wieseo heundeulligo
iss-eodo husnal ulin padoleul balbgo seoiss-eulgeoya
nachseon gil wieseo
nuguna gil-eul ilh-eo beolil su-iss-eo
heomnanhan gildo naega hamkke hal teni
uli dasi hamkke nolaehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoleul hyanghan-i gil-eun kkeutnaji anh-eulgeoya
modeun iyuwai gil-i
aleumdaun geon negaiss-eoseo
i gil-ui kkeut-eseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega,
naega neol jikyeo julge
hog-yeo museun il iss-eodo uli,
dasi kkog mannaja

eoduun bam-eul geol-eul ttae
geogjeonghaji ma naega issjanh-a
balg-eun bich-i seumyeo deul-eo eodum-eul balghyeo jwo
uli dasi hamkke nolaehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoleul hyanghan-i gil-eun kkeutnaji anh-eulgeoya
modeun iyuwai gil-i
aleumdaun geon negaiss-eoseo
i gil-ui kkeut-eseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega,
naega neol jikyeo julge
hog-yeo museun il iss-eodo uli,
dasi mannalgeoya

jamsi uli sum-eul goleugo tto dasi
himdeulgo jichin yeojeong-eul
kkeutnaego uli majuhae
achim-i ogi jeon-e geuttae
jeoljeong-i ileu deus ulin
seongjangtong-eul gyeokkgoissneun geoya
na-egelowa gil-eul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
ttaseuhan ongileul nanumyeon gil-eul dasigeum
chaj-eul su-iss-eultenikka
geobnaeji anh-ado gwaenchanh-a
i gil-ui kkeut-e ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
ppaleuge jinaganeun sigan sog-e ulil jikyeo julgeoya
jamsi sogdoleul neujchwodo uli,
dasi mannalgeoya

author: @Ci_archive
text:
[Mingyu] nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
[Vernon] padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

[Woozi / DK] naccseon gil wieseo
nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
[Woozi] heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

[All] uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
[Hoshi] modeun iyuwa i giri
areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

[Joshua] i girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeo julge
[The8] hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dasi kkok mannajaâ€¦
[Jun / Seungkwan] eoduun bameul georeul ttae
geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
[Jun] balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

[All] uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
[S.Coups] modeun iyuwa i giri
atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

[Seungkwan] i girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeo julge
[Wonwoo] hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dasi mannal geoyaâ€¦

[Dino] jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
kkeutnaego uri majuhae
[DK] achimi ogi jeone geuttae
jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

[All] naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
[Woozi] chajeul su isseul te nikka
geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

[Jeonghan] igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
uril jikyeo jul geoya
[Wonwoo] jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
dasi mannal geoyaâ€¦

author: @wonuluvrs
text:
us, again lyrics

nega pyeonhi georeul su ittdorok
eonjenga neol wihan gireul mandereujul geoya
pado wieseo heundeulligo isseodo
hutnal urin padoreul balbgo seo isseul geoya
nat seon gil wieseo
nuguna gireul irheobeoril su isseo
heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni
uri dashi hamkke noraehaneun geuddae, geunalkkaji
neorul hyanghan i gireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
modeun iyuwa i giri areumdawun geon nega isseoseo
i gireul kkeuteseo banhwanjeommajeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeojulge
hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dashi kkok mannaja
eoduwun bangeul georeul ddae geokjeonghajima naega ittjanha balgeun bichi seumyeodeureo rodumeul balgyeojeo
uri dashi hamkke noraehaneun geuddae, geunalkkaji
neorul hyanghan i gireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
modeun iyuwa i giri areumdawun geon nega isseoseo
i gireul kkeuteseo banhwanjeommajeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeojulge
hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dashi mannal geoya
jamshi uri sumeil goreugo ddo dashi 
himdeulgo jichim yeojeongeul kkeutnaego uri majuhae
achimi ogi jeone geuddae
jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
seongjangtongeul kyokkgo ittneun geoya
naegerowa gireul hemaegoittdamyeon eonjedeun
ddaseuhan ongireul nanumyon gireul dashigeum chajeul su isseul tenikka
geobnarji anhado gwaenchana
i gireui kkeute ongiwa ddaddeulthan misoga
ppareuge jinagsneun shigan soge uril jikyeo jul geoya
janshi sogdoreul neutchueodo uri
dashi mannal geoya

text:
Romanized Lyrics :

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihan gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun

Chajeul su isseul te nikka

author: @chizdawg9870
text:
Just finished watching. Had to pause this a couple of times because I am so overwhelmed with my emotions. Literally crying right now. Damn I love seventeen so much that no words can ever express it. Before slipping into the diamond life, I used to be so lost and empty. Whenever people would ask me what I really want to become in life, all I'd say is that Iwant to be happy. All I've ever wanted was to be happy. It first started with watching carat made videos with seventeen's funny moments, then watching going seventeen, then finally listening to their music. For so long, i've taught myself to not feel emotions, so that i won't get hurt but damn seventeen's songs made me feel. ACTUALLY FEEL EMOTIONS just by listening to their song and reading their lyrics. I was so shocked because I've listened to millions of songs before but nothing has ever moved me the way their songs did. Because of them, I faced my emotions that I buried deep down. I accepted parts of myself I thought I'd always be ashamed of. I learned to love myself more than anything in this world and it feels so damn good. I used to be so afraid of facing the world because I didn't want to get hurt but seventeen inspired me. The way they faced the world, the way they always worked hard, the way they always stand up taller every time they fell down, the way they love each other, the way they pour parts of themselves in every masterpiece they produce, the way they're so passionate in everything they do (even in playing games), and the way they're always positive that no matter what happens, it'll be alright because things would get better. They inspired me to live life, to actually passionately LIVE, work hard, and they made me brave that even if i face rejections or failures, it's alright. I used to be so afraid of being hurt, rejected, and failing but now those things energizes me to work harder and live life better. I can finally look in the mirror and genuinely smile because now i know that i'm happy. really happy. No matter what challenges come my way, I'm not scared anymore. And even when I get sad, I just listen to seventeen's music, watch their spectacular performances, watch going seventeen and all their other videos, and I'd instantly cheer up and feel comforted because if these 13 boys worked so hard and achieved so many things then I believe I can achieve my dreams too. More than the awards and achievements that seventeen have, what I'm most proud of is who they've become as artists and as people. Their music healed and saved people. They've become that light that inspires and guides people. Even after 10,20 or even 50 years, I would always be grateful to Seventeen because they helped me love myself and love life. Choi Seungcheol, Yoon Jeonghan, Hong Jisoo, Wen Junhui, Kwon Soonyoung, Jeon Wonwoo, Lee Jihoon, Xu Minghao, Kim Mingyu, Lee Seokmin, Boo Seungkwan, Chwe Hansol, Lee Chan, Thank you. No words can ever describe how insanely talented and amazing you are. Us, Carats, are very very proud of everything you've achieved and who you've become. We will always be here for you. We will always support you and have your backsğŸ’“ğŸ’ğŸ’“ Also thank you to Carats because y'all are the most peaceful, loving, caring, and supportive people I've ever met! Let's all live passionately, work hard to reach our dreams and support Seventeen! 

Much love, 
M.V.R.A.P â¤ï¸

Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

author: @felindaaishanabil104
text:
nega pyeonhi geol-eul su issdolog
eonjenga neol-wihan gil-eul mandeul-eo julgeoya
pado wieseo heundeulligo
iss-eodo husnal ulin padoleul balbgo seoiss-eulgeoya
nachseon gil wieseo
nuguna gil-eul ilh-eo beolil su-iss-eo
heomnanhan gildo naega hamkke hal teni

uli dasi hamkke nolaehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoleul hyanghan-i gil-eun kkeutnaji anh-eulgeoya
modeun iyuwai gil-i
aleumdaun geon negaiss-eoseo
i gil-ui kkeut-eseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega,
naega neol jikyeo julge
hog-yeo museun il iss-eodo uli,
dasi kkog mannaja

eoduun bam-eul geol-eul ttae
geogjeonghaji ma naega issjanh-a
balg-eun bich-i seumyeo deul-eo eodum-eul balghyeo jwo
uli dasi hamkke nolaehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
neoleul hyanghan-i gil-eun kkeutnaji anh-eulgeoya
modeun iyuwai gil-i
aleumdaun geon negaiss-eoseo
i gil-ui kkeut-eseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega,
naega neol jikyeo julge
hog-yeo museun il iss-eodo uli,
dasi mannalgeoya

jamsi uli sum-eul goleugo tto dasi
himdeulgo jichin yeojeong-eul
kkeutnaego uli majuhae
achim-i ogi jeon-e geuttae
jeoljeong-i ileu deus ulin
seongjangtong-eul gyeokkgoissneun geoya
na-egelowa gil-eul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
ttaseuhan ongileul nanumyeon gil-eul dasigeum
chaj-eul su-iss-eultenikka
geobnaeji anh-ado gwaenchanh-a
i gil-ui kkeut-e ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
ppaleuge jinaganeun sigan sog-e ulil jikyeo julgeoya
jamsi sogdoleul neujchwodo uli,
dasi mannalgeoya

author: @sandyren9274
text:
i'm crying. not only because of what seventeen means to me, or these lyrics, but other carats stories in the comment section. i have always knew about svt but never deeply stan them until the beginning of this year. they truly offer me an escape from the chaos of my life. they brought happiness to the dark thoughts going through my mind. i never felt more at home in a fandom, carats are the most loving family, and svt being their silly self brought back the carefree me. SEVENTEEN, thank you for existing. thank you for your love. thank you for your music. thank you for your support. thank you for being my home. thank you for being my inspiration. thank you for being my comfort. thank you for everything. seriously, as another carat had said. let's meet again, even after the last "say your name" (even though I hope there isn't a late, but i know you guys will be shining wherever you guys are). 

thankyou carats for being so welcoming and loving.
"SEVENTEEN! BOGOSHIPO! SARANGHAE!"

author: @lookatmafit17
text:
Here's the lyrics so we can stream while recording our fanchant! Please like this so other carats can see!! Don't forget to vote on sma! Fighting! â™¡

Nega pyeonhi georeul su issdorok
Eonjenga neol wihaen gireul mandeureo jul geoya
Padowieseo heundeulligo isseodo
Husnal urin padoreul balpgo seo isseulgeoya

Naccseon gil wieseo
Nuguna gil ilheo beoril su isseo
Heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Areumdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi kkok mannaja
Eoduun bameul georeul ttae
Geokjeonghaji ma naega issjanha
Balkeun bicci seumyeodeureo eodumeul balkhyeojwo

Uri dasi hamkkenoraehaneun geuttae, geunalkkaji
Neoreul hyanghan igireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
Modeun iyuwa i giri
Atomdaun geon nega isseoseo

I girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
Nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
Naega neol jikyeo julge
Hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
Himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
Kkeutnaego uri majuhae
Achimi ogi jeone geuttae
Jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
Seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

Naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
Ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
Chajeul su isseul te nikka
Geopnaeji anhado gwaenchanha

Igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga
Ppareuge jinaganeun sigan soge
Uril jikyeo jul geoya
Jamsi sokdoreul neujchwodo uri
Dasi mannal geoya

Ending:
SEVENTEEN! BOGOSHIPPEO! CARATHAE!

author: @lieagain4656
text: Mereka yg membawa saya ke dalam dunia penuh cinta. Saya sangat bersyukur telah mengenal mereka dan kalian, keluarga diamond. Pada awalnya saya hanya menikmati musik mereka dan mengikuti kegiatan mereka, singkatnya saya telah menjadi Carat. Sampai pada akhirnya, saya berada di titik terendah kehidupan saya mendengarkan lagu Hug yg ternyata sangat membantu sekali. Seumur hidup saya, saya baru merasakan dan mendengarkan lagu yg dapat membuat saya tenang, membuat saya saar bahwa saya tidak sendiri. Dan setelah itu saya merasakan rasa cinta yg begitu semakin besar untuk mereka serta kalian. Mereka, Seventeen, ketiga belas manusia yg sangat sangat berpengaruh untuk hidup saya sebagai remaja. Banyak sekali pelajaran yg saya ambil dari mereka. Dan kalian, Carat, adalah salah satu hal yg saya syukuri. Saya benar benar merasa kita sebagai keluarga. Dengan adanya lagu ini kita tahu seberapa besar cinta mereka untuk kita. Mari jaga kekeluargaan kita, saya harap hubungan kita tetap baik baik saja. Perbedaan pendapat dalam sebuah keluarga itu hal yg wajar, jika ada salah satu dari kita yg salah mari ingatkan mereka. WHATEVER HAPPENS TO US, LETS MEET AGAIN.

author: @tejaswi2105
text:
One thing I'm always looking for is love ! 
Our community have wrong definition of love ..
 humiliating someone to the level ..that the person will cry or unreasonable hate or bullying or negative reinforcement or hammering someone with saying that you are not  worthy of love  or your blood /ancestors are the reason why you need to suffer even though you hv done nothing or conflicts in thoughts...these all things makes me wonder what love looks like ? Am I really worthy of love ? Will I ever experience it ?? And genuinely at this point I'm scared.
My life journey till now have taught me that love comes in all different forms..even a simple smile or few encouraging words can give that happy feeling . I need those words .I need someone to say that I'm a good person. I need someone to say that I've been through a lot and deserves all happiness .
I've never been so vocal about my needs..I tried not share this side of me to my friends or colleagues ..only few know this ..and they care for me ..but I don't want to bother them again and again.
PPL say that I'm very kind person ..with a really beautiful smile , I wish I could tell them this smile and kindness comes after all those dark nights where I cried in silence ..so that no one will understand that I'm crying.
Cause all those tears told me to give love as much as possible to everyone around you .. because make sure you won't be the reason for someone else's tears .
I wish I could be more vocal about my problems..but somewhere I gotta keep the dignity of the PPL who create all trouble in my life . It's complicated..
Hence I'm telling ya'll to be kind and nice person..to everyone who comes in your way . Spread love .
                                   - 23 year old human

author: @m_s4651
text:
I feel safe. This song is so beautiful and the meaning behind it is too.â¤ï¸ğŸ˜‡

Seventeen, thank you for being here for Carats. Thank you for loving us and appreciating us. Thank you for working so hard. Thank you for allowing us to have a dream and letting us know that itâ€™s never too late to follow and achieve them. Thank you for being the heat to make us Carats shine. I hope we make you shine. I hope that Carats make you proud. I hope you know that Carats love you guys for who you are, your teamwork, your messages you send through your songs, your amazing talent, the list goes on and on.

I just want you to know that you all are enough. You make Carats proud to be Carats. You make us look forward to every Monday. Thank for that because I used to hate Mondays but now I have a reason not to.

SEVENTEENâ™¾CARAT

author: @finibestiara3948
text:
Several years ago, I dont like Kpop because my friends who become a fandom of a group expressed it in the wrong way so that I think kpop was a bad thing. 

But one day came, and I didnt know why that made me started to open myself to kpop until I know BTS and became an Army several years after that (it was really hard for me to realize that I loved them that much because I already thought that kpop was negative). I decided to become an Army because I really need someone to comfort me at that time. 

After that, I stan BTS only for a long time. And now I just became Carat. After they joined Bighit label I started to know them and I realized that they deserve my love as well. 

Besides Seventeen, there so many other groups that I tried to know, and I never felt something in them except TXT. So it is not like I love them because they are from Bighit label as BTS, but it is really because they are a great group. The thing that made me delay to know Seventeen because they are 13 members and I was afraid if something will happen to them. But now I know that they have a great bounding and personality so that I know that they will solve all their problem together and regret a bit not to know them earlier. 

After I realized that I need Seventeen in my life, I started to follow their social media, watch their content, also join the voting to support them. I have no bias because I know they all already worked hard and appreciate them in the same way. I am also not the type of person that likes to comment like this, but after hearing this song I decide to write this and I hope someone of you will read it as well. As I said I'm a new Carat, I just know them during this pandemic and never saw them in person. However,  this song makes me wanna meet them as I miss them very much and know them for a long time ago. This song comforts me, makes me feel I can go everywhere because they will protect me. 

I am sorry if I bring the other group to this comment. But I need to mention them because I want you to know if it is not an easy way for me to like something and they deserve my love that much. After this, I will always support them. I promise that I will be a good fan and I hope can really meet them in person someday. And last, sorry if there is a typo or grammatical error because English is my second language. Thank you, love you all!!!

author: @rosequartz1933
text:
This song never fails to touch my heart.
SEVENTEEN, thank you. Thank you for all the songs you've made that helped to comfort me, to brighten up my days. Thank you for being your chaotic, pure, wholesome selves and bringing me laughter and joy every single day. Thank you for being you.
CARATs, thank you. Thank you for loving these 13 men and for supporting them, for listening to their music. Thank you for being such a welcoming family to baby Carats. Thank you, really, for being there for SEVENTEEN.
I only became fan since late 2018, after Thanks was released. I wasn't there since the beginning, but I'll stay till the end. I'll continue to support them even after hundreds of lifetimes. I'll stay with them.
I'm really glad to have found SEVENTEEN, my second home, and CARATs, my second family.
Till the last "Say the name" and after~

author: @ikaa1304
text: Through all the years , I'd been fighting alone with anxiety and depression even with people around me. And I tried to end my life several times but failed. I just wanted to say thank you to these 13 boys who lighten my life again.. Only those beautiful songs help me to recover and stand up again. It felt like there's someone that truly listening to my problem and comforting me everytime I'm having a hard time. And this song too made me feel like I will always be protected by you guys.. Thanks again to SEVENTEEN for bringing back happiness to me . To my fellow CARATS , let make our boys happy too like how they brought happiness to us , and support them till the end.

I don't know what I'm doing in life, I don't wanna talk with my friends nor share my worries to anyone..but I really felt like writing this here.

You're my diamond.

author: @theuntamedseason2butimgranny
text: Hi, i just wanna share my experience with SEVENTEEN. I'm a fan of them since 2017, when I attended their concert i'm not a fan yet but after watching the concert i've become their fan. But then I left the fandom on 2019, for like 7 months I think? I thought I will never go back to SEVENTEEN again. Out of all group I stan only SEVENTEEN made me go back to them. I just hope that I'm still welcome because SEVENTEEN became my home again, no scratch that. SEVENTEEN IS ALWAYS MY HOME.

author: @shinejin1591
text: hello, recently i started to listen to seventeen and i have to say i'm hooked. i knew of their music before and listened to them occasionally, but then they came back with home;run and i don't remember when was the last time i was that obsessed with a song, i seem to always listen to it nowadays as it's pure fun! one thing led to another i'm gradually getting to know them as individuals through their shows, i'm so impressed with their covers as well... they have a gift, a talent to produce and perform honest music. it can be seen through us, again or in their title track home, which is so so beautiful. im so excited to get to know them and their music better!

author: @starlitfireflies9195
text:
One lonely day in March, I decided to check out this group through recommendation from my brother. One video I stumbled upon was their acoustic version of Donâ€™t Wanna Cry. After one listen, I knew that I was going to stan them. The singing, the emotions, they hit me so hard. Iâ€™m in love with almost every ballad Seventeen has ever made, and this is probably one of my favorites. Itâ€™s filled to the brim with emotion, longing, and hope. At the end of the day, when all is said and done, we will be together. 

I wasnâ€™t here from the beginning, but I swear Iâ€™ll stay till the end.
Say the name, SEVENTEEN!

author: @JoarCherryGapate
text: I can say that Seventeen is not just a group that you'll just go crazy with,they are every carats lifeline and support system. You can genuinely feel that they love their fans just by listening to this song and also smile flower. You can tell that they are not just doing their work,fan services and such but they truly care for their fans. They don't forget to thank and dedicate a song for carats. And that's what i love about them. I regret that i didn't stan them for the past 5 years but i promise that i'll be with them until the end. Until their last fan meeting,last concert,last gose ep and last song. I don't know but Seventeen is really something else and i pity those ppl who still sleep on them.

author: @emilytando8868
text: I listen to this song almost every night before I go to bed. It's a healing song from a healing group. Whenever I listen to this, I feel like all my worries and stress is relieved. I feel calm and like I can get through this. I'm so glad that Seventeen exists and I'm so glad I stumbled upon DWC one day and became a Carat. With seventeen, I've met so many new friends and made so many beautiful memories. And I don't think anoyone will understand how much they've impacted my life, my mindset, everything. I don't think anyone can understand how much they mean to me. But I will never let go of them no matter what happens.

author: @erickaruiz7165
text:
Hola carat, no sÃ© si alguien algÃºn dÃ­a lea esto, espero que no porque me da mucha pena mostrar mis sentimientos jjsja 
Estos dÃ­as han sido muy difÃ­ciles para mi existencia.
EntrÃ© a una escuela para ser maestra de espaÃ±ol de secundaria, y no existe una razÃ³n de porquÃ© entrÃ© aquÃ­ pero estoy haciendo mi mayor esfuerzo por poder encajar en esto y sentirme parte de algo y no quedarme sin estudiar algo que puede ser de mucha ayuda en mi futuro y que tal vez sea algo que de verdad me gusta hacer.
Como seguro te diste cuenta, no esto estoy segura si esta es mi vocaciÃ³n o no, por lo que es difÃ­cil decidir si me quedo aquÃ­ o no, decidir algo tan importante que determina mi futuro y estas decisiones que estoy tomando me llevan dÃ­a a dÃ­a al lugar al que pertenezco, decidir salirme de esto sin saber lo que quiero realmente a mi corta edad de 17 aÃ±os, y aunque tal vez es una edad en donde tus pensamientos son maduros y estÃ¡s seguro de lo que te hace feliz, siento que a mi aÃºn no me llega eso y me siento completamente triste, vacÃ­a, perdida y sobre todo estÃºpidamente tonta.
Tengo miedo de equivocarme y decepcionar a mi familia y a todas las personas que me apoyan y sobre todo a mi misma, terminar cansada de un camino al que no pertenezco y perderme sin llegar a ningÃºn final feliz.
Para serles sincera, no habÃ­a escuchado esta canciÃ³n ya que el tiempo fue pasando y nunca coincidÃ­ en entrar a la notificaciÃ³n o nunca me dieron ganas de abrirla, pero no me malinterpreten, Seventeen es una de mis mayores razones por las que quiero continuar existiendo, simplemente no me di a la tarea de escuchar la canciÃ³n y leer la traducciÃ³n para saber lo que nos querÃ­an transmitir, sin embargo, hoy que me encuentro en un mar de lÃ¡grimas sin entender nada ni entenderme a mi misma de la nada llegÃ³ a mi mente "Us, again". LeÃ­ la traducciÃ³n y es lo que mÃ¡s necesito en este momento, y una vez mÃ¡s puedo confirmar que esto se trata de algo mÃ¡s que un amor fan-idol, se trata de un apoyo lleno de esperanza y cariÃ±o mutuo, en donde nos ayudamos a encontrarnos a nosotros mismos y aunque las personas van a seguir hablando, diciendo que se trata solamente de unas personas que amas tanto pero ellos no te aman a ti, cuando se trata de todo lo contario, es un amor que siento hasta el fondo de mi corazÃ³n y me llena de felicidad saber que existen personas que me ayudan y estÃ¡n para mi ayudÃ¡ndome en este camino tan largo y difÃ­cil. TambiÃ©n mi cabeza va a hablar haciÃ©ndome creer que pudo haber sido cualquier otra cosa la que me levante el Ã¡nimo, alguien mÃ¡s cercano como mi familia o amigos o yo misma, sin embargo no puedo dejar de largo el hecho de que fueron ellos quienes me dieron la fuerza de seguir con esto y estoy infinitamente agradecida.
Mi lucha sigue en pie, pero se vuelve ligera sabiendo que alguien me estÃ¡ apoyando.

text:
They deserve so much more, they've grown so much. I love how they developed into who they are now, overcoming all the mistakes, staying strong all these years, finding comfort in each other, their families and CARATs.
They deserve the world because of all the hard work they put together, because they want to make people all around the world happy, because they are all the sweetest people ever although very different from each other.
They deserve happiness because at some point of time they thought they were not good enough.
They deserve love because....well, because everyone deserves love.

author: @joan7135
text: I'm here on a daily basis and it never fails to me make feel depressed its like reality hits, it makes me realise that time really does pass by so quickly that one day these boys will grow up and things will start to change, I am not saying they will part ways, but it will just be a different feeling, like our 2nd gens, 2pm, suju, shinee, they are all still tgt but it feels different.  But this is reality, like a part of me is sad but the other part of me is happy for being able to grow with them, and I guess this is what celebrities actually do, make their fans appreciate and support them no matter what stage of life both of us are in. Like I am genuinely sad thinking about how time really flies. Seeing them mature makes me realise even more that we really do age so quickly and should just do whatever we want and not regret anything done. I really do see seventeen being together for a long time, I really hope so.

author: @Dinoremi
text:
This song hits straight into the heart. It has never failed to make me emotional. I can't help but come back to it. I have been a carat for a year now and it is the best decision I made in my life and will forever be the best decision of mine. The only regret I have is that why didn't I know them from the start. But although I was not there in the beginning, I promise to be there till the last "Say The Name" and even after than that. Sharing this fandom with such great people and having such great idols is the best thing that happened to me. I think this one of my life as a Carat has been the happiest one I have ever had. Seventeen changed me but for the better, they made me a person who I never was. They taught me to love myself and do everything with passion. I don't know what would have happened to me if I never got to know about them. I promise to love you, Seventeen till the end and even after that. I promise to support you in every decision you make. You would never know how grateful I am to have you in my life. I'll forever be grateful.
I love you Seventeen.

author: @nissaayu6818
text: August 2020, im in my post caratland depression. I miss them so bad, i want to see them in person, i miss being with fellow carats screaming their name, feel the same feeling at the same time. Watching them shining bright on stage. Listening them singing all the comfort songs we need to hear. I miss them so much that hurts. This song really emphasized our relationship. I want to see Us, Again live after this situation get better. Hearing them sing this song for us in person. Until then i have to be content with watching this video. Until then both them and also me need to be healthy . Until we can see each other again. Looking at their face one by one. Giving them the loudest scream, showing them how much i miss them

author: @Pfomtnanatsuji
text: The way I saw it, I was thinking how Smile flower was a song for carats, from seventeen - gifting us by telling us that our smiles were precious to them, but this song; us, again is a story about SVT's journey from the past to now, and for the future. No one knows the future and we all know nothing lasts forever, but by saying that we will meet again, is SVT's gift of hope for the unseen future and a message that they will never have left us because they have left us music and songs.

author: @Mstrickster2
text:
Just found out from the comments section that they wrote the lyrics for their part in their own handwriting; that makes this feel all the more special to me. Thank you SEVENTEEN, for being there for us, for being there for me.
I was scared walking through the night alone; your song was there to protect me. I was pushed to the edge; your song was there to remind me I can still find happiness, at least in you. Thank you. I will try harder to be okay so we can meet again.

author: @pigrabbitsiji
text:
This song really makes me tear up every single time (just like Smile Flower), not because it's sad, but because it makes me feel super thankful. I've been a fan of various groups (yep, I'm old ><), but getting to know, and becoming a fan of, Seventeen more than 5 years ago is one of the biggest blessings in my life. Seventeen brought my old self back to life. Seventeen is also the only group that made me feel loved and trusted as a fan. They really do connect with Carats.

Carats let's support and love Seventeen, even after the last Say the Name. <3

author: @kimchicat20
text:
11:35pm
08-25-2020

I just feel like listening to it rn, i dont know but im feeling emotional to this song. I wish good health to all my boysâ¤

Dont stop creating good music. You didnt know but you helped me to love myself, to be confident, to overcome my depression. I thank seventeen for creating/producing good songs. I always listen to seventeen music whenever I feel down and it really made me lessen my sadness.

Thank you so much SEVENTEENâ¤

author: @neeyasworld
text:
Just finished watching Seventeen Hit the Road today. Happy to know that I was guessing right about the words that showed up at the end of every episode is a lyric of a song. 

Although I didn't expect that every words/lyric on every episode  were actually based on their line they sing on the song itself.

I really truly throughly totally love this!!! 

Thank you so much for the thoughtful and lovely ideas you guys give to us.

author: @katrinamarie6687
text: I listened to this song with 3 with different perspectives of who it's towards: to us, to eachother, and to themselves. All three are true and the same time, I believe. This is a love letter to their futures and to ours, from the past. Have we reached the point in time this song talks about? I truly don't know, and that's what makes it so bitter sweet.  Everything they do is wrapped in the most sincere passion for ones work I've ever seen. I can't claim to know for sure, but I can fee fear in this song, like their is tiny drops of anxiety. They love music and performing so much, it's in their blood and bones, and I think they're afraid of what comes after, once this part of their lives is through, just like us.

author: @sansastark6054
text:
They comfort me in a way my family and friends couldn't. 
It's almost unreal how I feel this unbreakable bond with them.
It's almost like I know them personally. 
I don't see them as boyfriends or whatever Kpop industry tries to sell their artists as but they're more like my support system. 
I want to thank them but that can never be enough. 
I wish I could see them someday. 
I was in a dark place from where I was dubious I could ever return. 
It was them who helped me. 
They somehow got through my thick skull, through all the pain and dark thoughts and made be believe that there's a better place. 
A simple thanks will never be enough I know but till the day we sing together again, I'll be waiting for you at your every step, cheering you, just like you did for me. 
If you ever get lost, we'll wait for you patiently to find your way back to us again. 
We've got your back fam.
This song is so beautiful I want it to imprint on my soul.

author: @lalabsyu6325
text:
When you're so uncertain about your life and what you are doing, you start to doubt everything and gets scared of the future. It feels like you're running out of time and kept running. You're getting tired of it, of everything, of everyone. 



And after hearing this song, tears pooled your eyes and it fell down to your cheeks. These are the words that you've been longing to hear. 


Just rest if you can't catch your breath and that's okay. Believe and walk straightly to the path you've been dreaming. You're not alone, you can hold on to someone's hand. 


You are at your own pace and after a long tiring day, you will be able to smile again. Just like night and day, sunrises and sunsets, the world needs you. 

You will able to meet the one you've been praying for. The YOU of tomorrow.

author: @sarahmarques6693
text:
I'm so emotional rn. this song touched me hard. seventeen has been my healing for four years straight. every time i thought of giving up, they gave me strengh. every time I doubt and hated myself, thay showed me I'm precious and I deserve to be happy too. they mean the whole world to me. i feel loved and special knowing I support these guys. I feel like they became my home after so much support and happiness that was given to me. I can't even express how thankful I am. It's okay to be lost, nothing lasts forever. We'll find our way and enjoy our lives. Living doesn't have to be so heavy and mean. If we stay together and love each other, we'll be able to get through our growing pains and finally treasure our paths. 
"I wanted to be your tomorrow, so I lived today."

author: @lunariyoo_n
text: I just realized that it's their own handwriting in the video. This makes it even more special. I never regret stanning Seventeen 4 months ago. I can't believe that last year, I never knew of them, and now, I can't imagine my life without them. They have indeed created a special place in my heart and I will cherish that till the end of time. I may not be there at the beginning but I can guarantee that I will be there until the very end. Thanks, Seventeen, for making my life better. You guys made me laugh a genuine laugh and I haven't done that in years and I thought I never will. This song really touched my heart and it almost made me cry. It's really comforting to listen to because it lifts off the loneliness that I feel, especially when I read the lyrics. I will continue supporting you through thick and thin. Keep making great and amazing songs and choreographies! ì„¸ë¸í‹´ ì‚¬ë‘í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤!

author: @everyoneseol
text:
Come to this after a hoshi's reply to carat on wv..
When the time has come, when I'll leave my fangirling life, I will remember SVT as my source of joyfulness, the happiest pills ever, the one who make me smile when my real life hit me hard. And I'm wishing all the happiness in life for them, because once upon a time they were mine.
I don't know wether I'll stay until the last say the name, but SVT and Carat will always be one of the best thing happened to me. I will never regret the day I slipped into this diamond life. And will always remember all the happiness I've been through with SVT. Thank you, I love you..

author: @meganong6010
text:
i'll make a road for you one day 
so that you can walk comfortably
even though we're shaking on top of waves
in the end, we'll be standing on top of the waves
on an unfamiliar path,
anyone can lose their way
i'll be with you even on the rough roads

until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
every reason and path is beautiful
because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll,
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
let's meet again.

when we walk through the dark night,
don't worry, i'm here
a bright light shines through the darkness
until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
every reason and path is beautiful
because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
we'll meet again.

for a moment, we'll catch our breath, then we'll
finish this hard and exhausting journey and meet each other
before the morning comes,
like we're reaching the peak, we're going through our growing pains 

come to me if you're lost at anytime
when we share our warmth, you''ll be able to
find the road again
you don't have to be afraid
at the end of this road, your warmth and your warm smile will
protect us as the time moves quickly past us
you can slow down a bit. 
still, we'll meet again.

author: @frky8761
text:
I already saw seventeen on 2018. But I was too focused on gg. When I left that fandom because of their toxicity, I felt like I am being toxic too and I dont want that, I dont really know what happened. It just happened that I searched their name and watch all of their performances. I watched all their variety shows. And I felt new with carats. I really felt that we are family. Not like on my past fandom that if you are new, they act like you know nothing about that group and will force you to leave.

Last september 2019, I became a carat. I guess like what they say,

"Still, Let's meet again" because I already met them on 2018

Its destiny

I will love seventeen with all my heart

author: @Warmelia
text: Masih ada yang nangis setiap denger ini? Berarti kita sama. Lagu ini artinya bener bener nyentuh aku secara pribadi. Banyak hal dihidupku yang aku gak tau untuk apa dan mau dibawa kemana, kaya aku udah buntu dan tiba tiba mereka drop lagu ini, beberapa lirik dilagu ini bikin aku kesentil mungkin? Kaya ayok pelan pelan aja kamu bakal ketemu akhir dari perjalanan ini kok tenang aja, jalannya gak akan pernah hilang walaupun waktu nyuruh kamu buru buru. Walaupun apapun itu, kita ada disini. Yg aku tangkep untuk diriku pribadi ya begitu. Jadi aku sangat banyak banyak berterima kasih untuk seventeen, 2020 ku bener bener berat tapi gak bisa aku katakan berat karena ada kalian dan carats semua. Makasih untuk lagu lagu yang menginspirasi kaya lagu us, again ini. Aku mau liat tulisan aku ini lagi 2, 5, 10, 17 tahun lagi. Aku pengen liat diriku lagi nanti dan seventeen yang akan sekeren apa lagi.

text:
There will come a day when we can listen to this song without tears, only warm smiles.
They will be on stage, and we'll be cheering our hearts out for them.
There will be hard times before that, there will be turbulance and struggles.
But knowing that good days are ahead, will get us back on our feet. Because they teach us how even in our darkest time, we will never be truly alone.
We will see each other again, thank you seventeen.
Know that when we light up your path, you light ours as well.

Carats â™¡

author: @buttersquashfan
text:
Seventeen debuted on May 26 with a live showcase televised by MBC. They were the first male K-pop group to debut with a one-hour live showcase on a major broadcasting channel, with label-mates Lizzy and Raina serving as MCs. Three days later, their first EP 17 Carat was digitally released.17 Carat became the longest-charting K-pop album of the year in the US and was the only rookie album to appear on Billboard's "10 Best K-Pop Albums of 2015" chart.

On September 10 their second EP Boys Be was released, which would later become the highest selling rookie album of 2015. The album's success earned the group awards at the Golden Disk Awards, Seoul Music Awards, and Gaon Chart K-Pop Awards. Seventeen was also the only K-pop group on Billboard's "21 Under 21 2015: Music's Hottest Young Stars" 

Seventeen held a four-date concert series titled 2015 Like Seventeen â€“ Boys Wish from the 24th to the 26th of December as an end-of-year celebration in Seoul. After the concerts' success, Seventeen held two related concerts the following February in 2016, entitled Like Seventeen â€“ Boys Wish Encore Concert.

author: @seventeenrighthere2518
text: Iâ€™m here again and this time Iâ€™m writing this. The first time I heard this, I was crying non-stop. I canâ€™t imagine when SEVENTEEN will part ways in the future. (I know that idol life is temporary.) SEVENTEEN brought me happiness. They are literally my life saviors when I was facing my downfall during my 15-yrs old self. 5 years later, Iâ€™m here being stronger than ever. Thank you SEVENTEEN. I could say â€˜thank youâ€™ for endless time but I wonâ€™t be tired saying it. 2015 is a bittersweet memory of mine. Behind those darkness, you shone brightly in front of me. I might not be here today if I didnâ€™t hear your music. And I really am thankful I have met these 13 boys. Continue inspiring us, and we will always support you, hard times or not. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

_
When Seventeen walks in the dark, donâ€™t worry, thereâ€™s a carat behind the Sebongs, because the way she keeps her beauty is Seventeen, and the beauty of Seventeen will make us look even more.
I always see and hear you sincerely, I'm comforted by your songs, by actions or by words, and I'm counting on Seventeen.
You guys, who were the only support to me,
And I wish I could lean on the Carats.
Even if you don't always try to do anything... Naturally, the carats are comforted and praised. Don't be lacking, please.
I feel more sick that you are talking to yourself for the bad thing than to swear at me.
The carats are able to meet again no matter what happens between us, and we have created such a relationship.
I want you not to be afraid of being away.
It's a good day now, so it's not going to happen now. Let's be happy now. Let's be happy, always laughing.
If we break up, we'll meet even if we're moving away, so we have to. Don't worry, don't be afraid.
You should go think about that then!
It's not easy, but I hope this makes me feel lighter. If you and I break up,
If so, I'll live with this word.
"We, until the day we shout each other's names again, this road that continues towards you and us after that day will not end, so let's wait a little longer."
I'll believe that we'll meet someday, even if we fall off, because we can hold on.
I always appreciate it, I'm sorry, I love you, Seventeen
Let's go, Seventeen Carrett

on an unfamiliar path,
anyone can lose their way
i'll be with you even on the rough roads

until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
all these reasons and this road are beautiful because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll,
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
let's meet again.

when we walk through the dark night,
don't worry, i'm here
a bright light shines through the darkness
until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
all these reasons and this road are beautiful because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
we'll meet again.

for a moment, we'll catch our breath, then we'll
finish this hard and exhausting journey and meet each other
before the morning comes,
like we're reaching the peak, we're
experiencing pain from growth

come to me if you're lost at anytime
when we share our warmth, you''ll be able to
find the road again
you don't have to be afraid
at the end of this road, your warmth and your warm smile will
protect us as the time moves quickly past us
even if we slow down for a little while, 
we'll meet again.

author: @behindthescreen2906
text:
Right now, I don't think I could go to their concert without thinking about those videos. What I mean is that, it would never gonna be the same anymore. The moment I would watch their concert, I would probably asking myself are they already tired, exhaused, drained? Are they still okay? Their health? I wanna cry. Maybe the moment I watch them performing would never be the same as usual. After watching all those episodes, I would watch them with a heart full of proudness. Eyes covered with tears of joy and a mouth shouting how proud I am for them. We always saw SVT performing full of joy and happiness and seeing these whole thingâ€”behind their successful performances, changes my perspective. These precious being deserve the whole damn universe. Thank you for letting us saw these other sides of yours, for showing us all you have gone through. For showing us how you are still fighting and giving all that you've got for you're gemsâ€”the carats. Now I can see clearly how those tears and sweats washed their ships to where they are today. All those hard works will surely gonna paid off. Keep soaring high, my Angels

Now, I fell harder the second way a round. I think, I am already drowning too deep, falling too hard. SVT would be the greatest fall that I would gladly take to risk at and I don't think I need saving anymore.

author: @giselanadine3859
text: I love how they use the same words from each of their episodes quotes and it's really cute and beautiful. I love this song so much it made my cry for a whole night thinking about their hardships trough the years until now they've succeed for being an amazing idol who inspires a lot of people, and also helped a lot of people who's having a hard time by their songs. They really deserve the world and all the love in this world, they deserve better. So CARATS let's support them no matter what and by that I mean let's support them until the last 'say the name' and of course we don't want that day to come but the reality is they will all have wife and kids that they love with all their hearts and they'll stop singing, dancing, and rapping. They'll also stop having concerts and fan signs. They'll stop performing together and start to focus on their own family. You probably don't wanna think about it, so do I. But please if that day has come please never forget that they're once the reason that we laughed and cried. I just wanna say please don't ever forget about them because they've done so much for us and we should too even though there's not much things we could do right now, and every little things we did for them they'll be very happy or touched even though we only did these little things, but that little things could be so meaningful for them. We love you SEVENTEEN! Thank you for reading :)

text:
someone who's not in this comment section pointed out how each members have improved their vocal technique and yes i agree a lot ;; specially if you have seen them live or seen their live video on youtube such as fancam from concerts.. so i'm just here to say and in hope seventeen will see this; i'm so proud to be a fan of seventeen, to be a carat. even after all these years, even after svt have come so far, they never stopped learning and improving. they never think that everything is enough already. which is really a great example for me and so impressive aaahh i really adore and have my whole heart for seventeen... T-T please never stop being carat's pride (i hope this doesn't come off as a burden tho ;; ....) and know that i am forever grateful to have live at the same time and place where all thirteen of you exist. let's all stay healthy and safe so we can still be with each other together, all 13 of seventeen and all carats all over the world, for a long long long time! â¤ï¸ ;;-;;

author: @imcheonga
text: I have symptoms of depression and overthinking, and my environment doesn't support me to recover. and the day before this song appeared the disease recurred again and it hurts me very much... I cried a lot and felt tired with life. I can only pray to God to give me medicine for all this. And it turns out this song appears tomorrow omg. I was very touched and cried a lot. I feel my heart healed by them. I feel like I'm not alone in this 'road', I'm very grateful to be in this fandom with seventeen and carats who give love to each other sincerely and become a home for each other. Thank you so much, y'all saved me^^

author: @guardianprincess9769
text:
it's 20XX, they stand together in one stage, 13 of them are there, facing their fans with a warm smile. that day is their last concert, they are no longer an idol group anymore after this. they are growing old, some of them are still continuing their carreer as a veteran singer and veteran actor, meanwhile some other are handling their business company from home, watching their child and grandchild living happily with them as a full family, etc. the last stage is this song, Us, Again. many days, months, and years have passed away since the first time they released this hurt-comforting song out on June, 8 2020. no matter how long time has passed they are still singing this song with the same feeling, like back then, when they were still strong and young. but this time, they give their all out to sing this song once again, as this farewell will never happened, for the very last time. but one thing for sure is we all know that like what they have always said is "whatever happen to us, we will meet again." they shout their last say the name, seventeen, with a deep-long bow. no words needed, their strong intertwined fingers explain them all. and the lighting goes black, the curtain is closed. the travel is ended here finally, but the journey would never.
-061020, jun's 24 bday, 2.08 AM

author: @Daily__RP
text:
Listening this song at 1.5x speed and to be honest it gives a different vibe....it makes me think that will all these things last forever, will everything fade away that matters to me at this speed, will I be alone again or something new will happen.


Listening to this song made me realize what "caring" and "not to be forgotten" actually means. Indeed it means alot. 

I will remember seventeen and my other bias grips forever since they are my reason to laugh, cry and love in my youth.

A quick scan through the top comments, and I'm surprised I haven't seen anyone note this, but the handwriting of the lyrics is the boys'. I can tell each of them wrote out their own parts they're singing :')
I love these boys to the moon and back. I've been their fan since i got into kpop in 2015, and they've gotten me through it all and always seem to be there when I need them most. It may sound corny, but I really feel like I was destined to be their fan, I feel like fate brought us together 5 years ago and has kept me with them ever since.

author: @farahnajwa6032
text:
This song really hit me. My life is been so hectic in the pass month and I have been myself lately. I've push away all of my friends and loves one. And I feel alone alone.

After hearing this song made me realize that I am not alone. I have seventeen. Those words really gave me comfort that whenever I need someone, they are here for me. I love them with all of my heart and I will never push them away. I will always support them. I will always love them. I will work hard for them.

SEVENTEEN to me is comfort and reassurance. They will always be there for me and I will always be there for them. Until the last Say The Name

author: @crymealiver5078
text:
This being the last MV uploaded on their channel is very significant. With all the changes regarding their company, I think they want to remind us with "Us, Again" that everything is still between us, Seventeen and Carats. The handwritten lyrics by the members in this vid is their way to deliver their sincerity, and the background image is just Seventeen and Carats. An assurance that nothing will change and that whatever happens, we will walk this road together forever.

Seventeen, my lovely boys, please know that you always have our hearts and support. Keep making music that makes you happy! We love you.~

author: @natashairdina5359
text:
I'm a carat for 2 years now, and I never regret slipping into this diamond life. This is where I found my real self, I found my friend that always supporting what I loves, that's it, Carat. We share our problems together. 

And the day when Us Again released, I was in mentally unstable, I was crying for the whole day and then when I listen to Us Again, I was crying too, but crying in happiness, the lyrics and the music comforts me. That's the power of Svt's music. I really meant it. Seventeen has a special place in my heart, Thankyou for always being my source of happiness.

author: @asthelilygrows4430
text: I've been a fan of kpop for more than ten years now -- taking a couple of breaks along the way. Discovering SEVENTEEN, their music, their brotherhood - everything about them at this point in my life must have been fate. I've met them as I entered adulthood and their music resonated to me on a deeper level. You just feel how much they take time to create music that will comfort their fans. Even without understanding the words behind Us, Again before - I can feel the sincerity in their voices. I can feel how much they care for their fans.  Hearing someone sing to you how it's okay to slow down, how it's normal to experience low points in your life -- it's okay because at the end we as carats always have seventeen. I just hope they really know and feel that same goes for them -- even after the last "say the name", we'll be there for them. We don't know where life will take us but being able to share these memories with SEVENTEEN. I know we'll always have each other. I'll gladly stay to go on this journey with 13 wonderful human beings. SEVENTEEN, thank you for conveying your thoughts, and opening up your feelings to us. Thank you for being our home, a warm blanket that hugs us at the end of each day.

author: @not-identified
text:
I'm one that doesn't stream or do much online, i have my reasons but i do buy their albums and went to their latest concert.  
I just love how CARATs genuinely support and feel their music, how we appreciate both the group and the staff behind them. Because for a lot of other groups (mainly the popular or somewhat mainstream boy groups) when i watch the comments on their MVs all i see is the words 'stream/streaming' and 'views'. Is okay to do those, sometimes for x amount of views in some vids we get special content or something. But seeing how "obsessed" in a way certain fandoms are about such things makes me think that they don't really care for the quality of the MVs, the songs and/or how much effort by the artist and staff was put into making them. Which is a pity. I scroll so much until i read comments saying how the person felt listening to the song, something about the music video or anything that is not about how they didn't reach 1 million views in 5 minutes after the video was dropped.

author: @princessmouton1636
text:
I was supposed to see them live on stage in March, but guess what, it got canceled. During two years, my only will to live was to see them, meet them, see them at least once with my own eyes, during two years I stayed alive, stayed nice with my parents just to see them. I cried of happiness when my mom fought with my dad so he would buy me tickets for the concert in Paris. I know it would cost a lot of money, I knew it was only a child's dream, I know that to them it didn't mean anything, during these two years I could have asked me to take me to at least 4 concerts of diffÃ©rents kpop groups that I Stan, but I didn't even mentioned it to them, Seventeen would be the first kpop group that I was going to see on stage, they were the reason me moving and leaving all of my friends was bearable and this concert was considered pointles by my dad which I love and appreciate. I cried for 2 days of happiness, and told everyone that I was going to see them, only for it to be canceled.
I know it was for the sake of everyone, the members, the stafs, and especially carats and I'm glad they did but at the same time, it broke my heart. Now I will continue to live in hope of seeing them one day.
To every carat, and to every members of seventeen, I hope we can meet one day, and thank you for making me happy through a screen!

author: @noyayuu3651
text: Terima kasih untuk SEVENTEEN. Sebelumnya saya tidak kenal seventeen. Saya bukan kpopers. Tapi setelah mendengar lagu ini (dengan terjemahan) aku menangis. Kehilangan pekerjaan karena covid19, diputuskan ex-boyfriend dan dia memilih menikah dengan wanita lain padahal sudah pacaran lebih dari 5 tahun, hutang yang menumpuk, dikhianati sahabat yang Aku percaya. Hampir saja aku depresi. Tidak ada seseorangpun disampingku. Duniaku seakan runtuh. Bahkan aku sudah memikirkan banyak cara untuk mengakhiri hidup. Semua terasa menyakitkan. Aku lelah. Aku ingin berhenti hidup. Sampai aku menemukan lagu ini. Terima kasih. Lagu ini menyemangatiku. Aku merasa hangat. Aku mulai mengerti ternyata dunia ini luas. Aku akan berusaha lebih baik lagi. Terima kasih seventeen.

text: if you were to ask me 4 and a half years ago when i first stanned them, i wouldnt have guessed that these ANGELS would have such a big impact on me, especially not knowing what was going to happen throughout these years. last september, i started high school, being clueless about the situations that were going to come in the next couple of months. i always found myself listening to their songs (at like 2am) crying (or having a dance party) at the lyrics because they were full of so much meaning. even though they don't know who i am, i promised myself that i would be able to see them one day. i always feel so loved whenever i just think about them, cause like LOOK AT THEM, they put so much effort to make sure that WE ARE HAPPY. if i could say all the things i would wanna say, this comment (lol its a book now) would be SOO long and filled with really dumb stories. ilysm and THANK YOU FOR LETTING ME CRY WHEN I NEED TO

author: @jz_es.469
text:
I haven't watched every Hit The Road ep cause it just slipped out my mind after losing my laptop. I just borrow gadgets from my family so I don't watch Youtube as much as before. I don't prioritize Kpop as it's not the only thing I'm interested at so I don't watch everything my bias groups put out. I know I don't get to put too much effort but that doesn't change my love for SEVENTEEN and my other bias groups. They make me happy and have been a great impact in my life. I didn't turn perfect after stanning them of course it just made me think about myself more and about my life which I've been so scared to do cause I'm messed up. I love Seventeen but all the things they've been doing seems to pass my radar and even if I get to acknoweledge it, it seems like whatever I do isn't enough for them. I love Seventeen I really do and I just hope I could be better for them cause they deserve so much 

-ğŸ’“ğŸ’œğŸ’

author: @yudhistiramahasena1255
text:
I feel sorry for those who don't stan Seventeen. I have been a Carat since Seventeen debuted, and they worked hard before debuting. S.Coups was one of the OG Pledis boys and was supposed to debut with NU'EST in 2012, but the plans were later cancelled. Then he and Woozi were supposed to be in the group Tempest, but again the plans were cancelled. 2015 was the year he became the leader of the self-producing kings we know and love today.

Seventeen is not just S.Coups, Jeonghan, Joshua, Jun, Hoshi, Wonwoo, Woozi, DK, Mingyu, The8, Seungkwan, Vernon, and Dino.
*Seventeen is 13 or none.*

text:
_D-14kst till SEVENTEEN'S comeback and D-2kst till uri Junnie birthday_

It's sad we were not able to reach 1million v17ws, but the fact that some of us were so determined to achieve it made me believe that we Carats can improve in str17ming together, instead of calling eachother lazy, angry at pledis better practice str17ming because while str17ming we are doing this for SEVENTEEN'S happiness. I won't be able to buy any albums not now maybe in the future but I'll try to do better in str17ming,votings and tagging them and I know that I'm not alone, I know some dedicated Carat's here. So let's all walk this flower path together. 

I'll still str17m Seventeen's songs no matter where it is posted 
[REMINDER] 
Str17m uri Myunghu's falling down.
Str17m uri Dino's dancelogy.

author: @janeler
text:
Through these rough days I've been going through right now, I am so glad there's SEVENTEENâ™¡

"To help you walk with no trouble, I'll pave a road for you someday"

These days where I feel really restless, they came and reminded me I'm not alone.

"On the strange road,  anyone can be lost. I'll be with you on the rocky way"

With these thoughts, even though I know I am just a fan against millions, I believe in our hearts we reciprocate these feelings..

"Every reason and path, is beautiful because of you."

And no matter how hard the days are, I know a part of me gets strength to keep going through them and their music.

"If we pass the turning point at the end of the road, I will protect you so you won't be worn out anymore."

So I hope one day, all will be better and I can finally say "I'm sincerely happy now and you helped me a lot". Until then, with brightest smiles and hearts filled with joy,

"Whatever happens to us, Let's meet again."

author: @msmsmsms1
text:
I want to tell this story to you. I have a friend, an internet friend to be exact. He was alone at the moment since he was quarantined somewhere far from his family because of covid 19. I met him like just a week ago and I became fond of him immediately. Then, we chatted each other almost everyday and I learned he is depressed and suicidal. Yesterday, the day where this song released was also his birthday and the sad part is that his whole family forgot about it. He called them to tell them that itâ€™s his 15th birthday but his family never cared. He was so sad and was about to end his life by overdosing his pills. Then, the time he told me his plan, this song was released. There, I was anxious about it and after hearing this song, I wanted to send this to him to rethink. He is a fan of one direction and he somewhat not fond of kpop thatâ€™s why I was anxious if I should send this to him or nah. In the end, I managed to send this song to him and I told him to listen to it. 

After a few hours, he chatted me, â€œthank you for this heartwarming songâ€ and I felt relieved. I was anxious before he chatted me back because I told him if he was planning to end his life, please listen this song that could change your mind. He actually sent me a long message but he thanked me for the song recommendation. He told me he doesnâ€™t understand a single thing but somehow it felt like the song is telling him to keep on living. He also apologized to me and all. Nonetheless, Iâ€™m so glad he decided to keep on living. Right now, he is trying his best to be positive and Iâ€™m so glad. He might not be a carat but this song moved him so much.

author: @mimi-nx1mj
text:
I've been stanning these boys for about 3-4 years and I always ask myself, "How and Why did I fell in love with these boys?" I, myself cannot answer the question. I can't even remember the first time I saw them. Was it the time my friend introduced me to Seventeen? Was it the time I was watching their mvs? I dont know, maybe it's because of their catchy songs and dorky attitudes. Then Us, Again started playing, and I suddenly knew why I fell in love with Seventeen. It's not just their songs, their attitudes and performance. It's the amount of hard work and feelings that they put into their songs and choreos. The comfort that they give us through the lyrics of their song is enough to make us feel calm and safe.

Our boys may not be as popular like other groups, but this I promise you: I will stay till the end and beyond the end. I will stay as a solid carat no matter what happens. Seventeen will be my kings forever and moreâ™¡.

author: @ChildOfHalit
text:
*SEVENTEEN COMEBACK ON JUNE 22!!!!*

UPDATE: *MUSIC VIDEOS* and *TEASERS* will be *UPLOADED* in *BIGHIT LABELS*

Let's make this their best comeback yet. I hope we could all set goals that we can all work together to reach. The past weeks have been quite bumpy for us, and more dramas will probably come out as we approach comeback season, but I hope they won't stray you from what is important to us and that is *SEVENTEEN* . We will support this comeback and their MVs (wherever they would be posted). 

Kcarats have started planning for the comeback. And i hope everyone knows that they will go all-out for this. So i hope icarats can also support and give our best for this. 

GOALS:
*1M PRE ORDERS OF THE UPCOMING ALBUM OF THE YEAR!!!*
*10 MILLION vi3ws for the MV in the first 24 hours*

CARATS, FIGHTING!

author: @wonumoni1457
text:
I'm a carat for less than a year and Seventeen is probably the first group I feel such a huge connection. They are my diamonds, my love, my day, my dawn, my one and only seventeen. As Minghao said "Seventeen is my youth" and they really are. They've taught me how to grow up, how to be happy and how to never give up of my dreams. I can't put in words how much they mean to me, is literally impossible. Like my life: I can't describe all my life without missing something. Same goes for my love for Seventeen: I can't describe it all without missing something.
My path will always be easy and cheerful if I'm with you. 
Thank you for everything, i will be always by your side ì‚¬ë‘í•´ <3

author: @jjsainte
text:
Dear Seventeen,
MANSAE! This song HIT me again. I keep saying that I DON'T WANNA CRY, but OH MY! I just did and my heart went BOOM BOOM. To say that it's VERY NICE is an understatement, and it deserved more than a CLAP. This song made me want to ADORE U more. It showed how PRETTY U are, your songs, your hearts. THANKS for inspiring a lot of carats, including me (of course). I wish that I could make a CALL CALL CALL so I could tell you these. FEAR? Anxiety? Depression? You made those things disappear gradually like a FALLIN' FLOWER. You're the HOME of every lonely heart, you're the comfort of every bewildered soul.

This is an oath: I promise to take the road with you until the last say the name. I will take the road with you, be it rocky or concrete. Together, with you and my fellow carats, we will have our HAPPY ENDING. Things may separate us at some point, but a song is enough to get us back again. Just one melody from you guys and I already know we're GETTING CLOSER towards each other. And I, I solemnly swear that no matter how many years would get by, it would forever be US, AGAIN.

Aku berharap kita akan terus bersama sebagai Seventeen dan Carat. Aku berharap Seventeen selalu bahagia, terima kasih selalu berusaha untuk menjadi yang terbaik bagi Carat. Selalu jaga kesehatan, jangan lupa makan dan istirahat. Aku sayang kalian

author: @svtcarat8816
text: i've said this a lot of times now but seventeen has really made such a huge impact on my life. there were times that i would randomly have anxiety attacks and just cry endlessly, but seventeen has always comforted me through their songs. just recently, i have been crying for weeks thinking that i'm not doing enough, that things are not going my way, and that everything is just not working. everyone else is doing fine on their own, yet here i am. stuck, lost, and left behind. i have been doubting my self worth, thoughts of giving up have flooded my mind. but then seventeen released this. it's like they really know how and when to comfort me. they literally saved me. this is exactly what i needed to hear. someone reassuring me that they would be there by my side, no matter what happens. that although life may be hard, although we get lost sometimes, seventeen would always be there. so thank you, seventeen. for telling me how the sky is always the darkest before sunrise. for giving me hope that we'll eventually find our way back. thank you for being my home.

author: @sylviamanpioper9068
text: Dear SEVENTEEN, sudah setahun ini aku mengenal kalian dan pertama kali aku merasa bangga dengan pilihanku untuk mencintai orang lain sedalam ini, aku mudah menangis ketika melihat kalian kesakitan atau aku membaca komen yang menjatuhkan kalian... Aku selalu tertawa menonton gose sebagai hiburan dan healing bagiku dengan kehidupanku yang berat, ketika kalian melakukan tour amerika aku sedang berada di masa kelas 9 dimana kegiatan padat banget, aku bahkan absen nonton gose dan konten lainnya, aku pulang sekolah hanya sempat liat berita kalian beberapa menit dan ketika ku melihat berita ada member yang sakit aku hanya bisa menangis sambil menguatkan diriku untuk lanjut mengerjakan tugas, namun ketika rest aku juga rest, aku bahagia karena dari pandemi ini aku tidak melakukan ujian nasional namun aku selalu menangis mengingat bahwa konser kalian tertunda, japan dome tour yang batal... Bahkan aku melihat idol lain yang sudah berhasil melakukan japan dome tour air mata jatuh tanpa diundang... Namun ketika kalian mulai bekerja untuk comeback aku juga mulai kembali ke aktivitasku belajar dan belajar.. Melihat carat lain yang berhasil bertemu dengan kalian aku semakin terpacu untuk lebih keras dengan belajar dan bisa bertemu kalian tidak lupa aku berdoa sebab tidak ada yang mustahil di mata TUHAN. Kiranya TUHAN selalu memberkati kita..dan  sudah sejam dari lagu ini rilis maaf tidak bisa menaklukan satu juta, tapi aku rasa berapapun tidak akan mengurangi cinta kalian untuk carat, carat juga kokk okeh ini ntar jadi cerpen

author: @wolfyagriche7530
text:
Thank you, thank you very much, seventeenğŸ˜Š

Maybe the word Thank you is not enough to express the gratitude I met you all.
But really I am very very thankful because 5 years ago I had experienced severe depression but at that moment I met you guys for the first time, Seventeen.

Seeing you always working hard, always smiling, and not giving up makes me cry. Then somehow all the negative thoughts in my head disappeared.
Now I am more excited, cherishing my life and happier.

So thank you makes me feel better.
Thank you Seventeen for coming and making us (carat) happy.
We Love You Seventeen! And
Seventeen is my only favorite idol group !! ğŸ’•â¤ğŸ˜Š

Seventeen keep fighting!
