author: @gertrudelirio3560
text:
I will protect and support SEVENTEEN at all costs because they been saving me all this time.
I've been thru some difficult shit to the point I thought that giving up will be easier than fighting. But seeing them start from rock bottom, struggling and continue doing their best to reach their dreams change my heart. I suddenly thought I also want to do my best I also want my dreams to come true I also want to be free from everything that's been chaining me. Yes, it wasn't easy there were times I thought that only chosen privilege individuals are able to reach their goals. But every single comeback they remind me nothing is easy, just keep doing your best, keep your head upon your goal, keep improving, compete with yourself not with others until the time that all your hard work pays off. I was rushing and juggling everything so that I can finally see the results of my hard work yet nothing was happening. And every time I feel like this their music, again and again, saves me from giving up. SEVENTEEN thank you for reminding me this time that I have time that there's no need to rush that I can pause and breathe then continue from where I left off. You guys really are amazing. I love you to no end.

author: @lovelyflozh3091
text:
Terima kasih banyak seventeen atas kerja keras nya selama ini. Membuat aku yang sedang bersedih dan bingung, bisa kembali tenang hanya karena kalian. Terima kasih banyak atas cinta kalian untuk kami, terima kasih untuk kalian yang menahan sakit dan lelah hanya untuk kami. Terima kasih juga telah menghibur kami semua dengan lagu-lagu kalian. Maaf, aku hanya bisa mendukung dari jauh dan belum bertemu kalian secara langsung. 

Aku adalah salah satu dari banyaknya carat yang lain. Aku juga akan berusaha keras agar bisa bertemu dan bisa mendukung kalian lebih. Terima kasih banyak atas semuanya yang telah kalian lakukan. Kami mencintai kalian

text:
Us, Again

nega pyeonhi georeul su ittdorok
eonjengan neol wihan gireul mandereojul geoya
pado wieseo heundeulligo isseodo
hutnal urin padoreul balbgo seo isseul geoya
natseon gil wieseo
nuguna gireul irheobeoril su isseo
heomnanhan gildo naega hamkkehal teni

uri dashi hamkke noraehaneun geuddae, geunalkkaji
neoreul hyanghan i gireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
modeun iyuwa i giri areumdawun geon nega isseoseo

i gireui kkeuteseo banhwanjeommajeo jihamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeojulge
hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dashi kkok mannaja

eoduwun bangeul georeul ddae
geokjeonghajima naega ittjanha
balgeun bichi seumyeodeureo eodumuel balgyeojeo

uri dashi hamkke noraehaneun geuddae, geunalkkaji
neoreul hyanghan i gireun kkeutnaji anheul geoya
modeun iyuwa i giri areumdawun geon nega isseoseo

i gireui kkeuteseo banhwanjeommajeo jihamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeojulge
hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dashi mannal geoya

jamshi uri sumeul goreugo ddo dashi
himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul kkeutnaego uri majuhae
achimi ogi jeone geuddae
jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
seongjangtongeul kyeokkgo ittneun geoya

naegerowa gireul hemaegoittdamyeon eonjedeun
ddaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dashigeum chajeul su isseul tenikka
geobnaeji anhado gwenchana
i gireui kkeute ongiwa ddaddeuthan misoga
ppareuge jinaganeun shigan soge uril jikyeo jul geoya

jamshi sogdoreul neutchueodo uri
dashi mannal geoya

author: @rachelsumendap4644
text:
thank you.
thank you seuncheol. the best leader seventeen, carats, and anyone could ever ask for. you've done well, and fought well. i'm beyond thankful for you leadernim. you are so strong both physically and mentally. thank you for taking time off and prioritizing yourself and your mental health first, because that's the most important thing. thank you for coming back stronger than ever. i can't be more than happy for you, i'd give you all the time in the world you need to be happier.
thank you jeonghan. the fallen angel from heaven that has been sent to the world to be part of our shining seventeen and making carats lives brighter. thank you for being the comfort everyone seeks for, for being the angel that protects the membersji and carats. and for teaching us humor with your once in a while evil plans. but we all know you have the kindest soul.
thank you joshua. the softest beloved gentleman. thank you for silently taking care of everyone around you, and always wanting to do the best in everything you do. like how seventeen and carats are a blessing to you, you are too such a blessing to us carats. you were truly sent from God to make this world a blessing. we're all so proud of you, you are a dutiful son, we all love you josh.
thank you junhui. the funniest guy, most handsome dancer and singer, and a powerful center. thank you for working so hard and pushing yourself to be a better artist than you already are. thank you for showing us this brighter, more exciting side of you that is so lovable. you and your little antics and habits can crack up your members and carats every time. it's exciting to see how much you've come out of the shell to be more yourself, the lovable person you are. 
thank you soonyoung. our shining excited tiger. thank you for the artwork you created with seventeen's amazing choreographers. thank you for the overflowing energy you have given your members and carats. it's amazing how you can instantly boost someone's energy by your own presence, even if you'd tire yourself because of that. and how you can keep everyone going at points of exhaustion or when performing. thank you, please also take all the time to recharge, our bright star.
thank you wonwoo. the intelligent human being who likes to read and don't eat seafood. thank you for being the warm person you are to everyone even with the cold looks you have and for blessing us with your deep beautiful voice. thank you for keeping everyone's brains intact and all the smart life quotes you make. please don't ever question why thousands of people are supporting you and cheering for you, because you deserve all those love for working hard and for overcoming your trauma.
thank you jihoon. the main mastermind behind seventeen's beautiful art. our genius singer, songwriter, composer, producer, dancer, and coca-cola enthusiast guy. thank you so much for being the poet to seventeen's poems, the man behind the masterpieces of svt. thank you for always working day and night, sacrificing your sleep even though you love it, for writing incredible songs. and thank you for loving your members insecurities and knowing them heart by heart.
thank you minghao. the art and artist xu minghao himself. thank you for showing us the true meaning of art, for showing us different kinds of masterpieces of arts you created and teaching us how to appreciate the little things in life. thank you for working hard to show infinite charms that you have inside you. the most loved little 8, savage guy that should be protected at all cost. thank you for being yourself.
thank you mingyu. the smartest handsome guy and most responsible. thank you for always cleaning up everyone's mess, for being the fixer of broken things, for being the master chef that you are. thank you for being the man that everyone looks up to because of your talent and skills in everything. for always finding happiness in the current situations. you've taught us to never give up on our dreams, that we can do it. you've showed us that there is always a positive thing when times are rough.
thank you seokmin. the most precious gem stone, our musical singer, our wool of happiness. thank you for always being the happiest virus that you are, your smile is the brightest light we'd ever need to light up our worlds. thank you for always looking forward positively, for being considerate of others, for always wanting to make everyone smile and loved, for only seeing the good in everyone and everything. dokyeom, you are doing so incredibly well as an artist, don't ever be insecure and don't ever doubt yourself. you're one talented singer.
thank you seungkwan. the winner of rookie entertainer award, our comedian singer that is not a comedian okay, he is singer. thank you for always being who you are since you were a kid, someone who loved singing and someone who loved making everyone laugh. you are the best version of yourself, our diva boo, the lively, bright, energetic person you are. thank you for always enjoying and appreciating the time to yourself too. 
thank you hansol. venonie, our quiet intelligent breathtaking rapper. thank you for being the amazing composer you are at a young age, and for being the free-spirited. thank you for teaching us "swag", and for teaching us that nothing is weird or funky, when it comes to expressing yourself. you're such a unique human being that don't need to say a lot of words to be iconic. thank you for the effortless being the walking, living, breathing human meme you are and putting laughs in carats and the members faces.
thank you chan. the future of k-pop, a little giant, maknae on top. thank you for the brightest curing laugh ever in the world. chan, your laugh is so contagious and it makes us happy by just hearing it. it's amusing to see how much you've grown as an artist and as a person. thank you for being the most talented maknae, a singer, dancer and choreographer, and a rapper. you have it all. thank you for being the powerful performer you are, amazing us with your stage presence everytime. 
THANK YOU SEVENTEEN. thank you for the hard work, and for making masterpieces of music. thank you for being the 13 men that carats loves and will forever support. thank you for making carats constantly feel loved and spoiled. seventeen, you guys are such a blessing to carats. we're all beyond grateful we have found you. thank you is even an underrated word to express how thankful we are to seventeen. our healing. our shining diamonds. our flowers. thank you seventeen. carats, TIL THE LAST SAY THE NAME!

author: @amaliakaromahtulhikmah2474
text: Disini, aku akan mengatakan, terimakasih, kalian sudah membawaku keluar dari kegelapan dan kesepian pasca almarhumah nenekku, pasca beliau meninggal, aku merasa kesepian walau sudah berada bersama sahabatku, aku adalah korban pengucilan teman-teman hampir sekelas, dan itu adalah masa terburuk buatku, bahkan di ulang tahunku yang ke 17 aku tidak dapat merasakan apapun karena begitu banyak luka yang ku terima, belum lagi keluarga besar ikut menyalahkan ku karena lalai menjaga ibuku yang sakit stroke ringan, jadi luka batinku semakin bertambah dikarenakan sebagai anak perempuan pertama harus kuat, harus bisa setegar karang, dan di usiaku yang ke 17 tahun, aku mulai menjadi carat. Entah itu sebuah kebetulan atau emang takdir. Suatu saat nanti kalau aku bisa ketemu kalian langsung, aku mau ucapkan banyak terima kasih, karena kalian sudah membawaku kembali dari titik kegelapan ke dunia yang lebih indah. Kalau kalian baca ini, aku hanya bisa bilang terima kasih yang paling dalam dari diriku akhirnya aku mau melanjutkan hidupku yang masih panjang. Sudah dari dulu aku ingin menyampaikan ini secara langsung, tapi aku juga harus memikirkan banyak hal, yang masih jauh lebih penting dari apapun. Semoga suatu saat aku bisa ketemu kalian buat menyampaikan hal ini secara langsung. Sekian curhatan saya, dan bagi carats yang liat komentar saya, tolong tetap hidup walaupun itu untuk dirimu sendiri, kalian harus tetap punya alasan hidup agar kalian tidak terjebak dalam situasi yang menyakitkan. Semoga hari kalian menyenangkan and i love you all

author: @shintaaurina774

author: @parasjoans.4364
text:
"Whatever happens to us." 
Something happened to me, to us, specifically. I am a Carat for 4 years now, long enough right? I promised to stay with you until the last say the name. I promised that you guys will always be in my heart. But something happened, I'm lost. I'm confused. I think I falling out of love. And just the thought of that, I want to cry. How could I? I don't want to believe but I can't fool myself anymore. I always say it's just I'm missing them, but no it's not. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Seventeen, you inspired me, you saved me, you made me happy. 

I'm totally lost. My heart aches. But no, I'm not gonna break my promise. SEVENTEEN, my babies, please wait for me. I'm gonna find myself, my carat self 4 years ago, and bring that back. For now, I'm lost but I assure you
We will meet again 
We shall meet again
My road towards you will never end. 

I don't want this to be my goodbye. I promise that I will find my way back to you and by then
"Let's meet again". I love you

author: @fmnzxxs5192
text: suatu saat nanti aku bakal ngenalin mereka beserta karya karya mereka ke anak anakku. ada saatnya mereka nanti merasa ga dibutuhin dan ga dipeduliin bahkan oleh orang tua sendiri yaitu aku. aku pengen saat mereka ngerasain hal itu, mereka punya sandaran dan ada yg mengerti mereka sama sepertiku. bukan berarti aku gamau ngertiin anak anakku, tapi pasti mereka ngelaluin masa ini. aku bakal cerita ke mereka seberapa besar pengaruh seventeen buat aku. dari dulu, aku nyari musik yg klop sama aku dan alhamdulillah aku kenal mereka, Seventeen. jujur, aku bukan kpoper dulunya. bukan karena apa tapi ya karena belum ada musik kpop yg masuk dan pas dihatiku. tapi pas tau karya karya mereka, bener bener pas banget buatku. awalnya cuma musik mereka yg bisa motivasi aku buat lebih baik dan ngilangin segala overthinkingku. tapi semakin ngenal mereka, semakin sayang. aku ngeliat mereka sebagai panutan. awards yg mereka dapet tentu bikin aku bangga. tapi selain itu yg bener bener bikin aku jatuh cinta adalah kepribadian mereka. lewat reality show mereka aku belajar banyak hal. hal hal yg aku butuhin buat sekarang dan kedepannya. aku ngebanggain mereka bukan hanya karena mereka idol tapi karena kepribadian mereka. mereka ber-13 sangat berpengaruh di kehidupan remajaku. mereka jadi healingku. sebenernya bisa aja aku ninggalin mereka karena keadaanku udah cukup baik. tapi aku rasa, aku butuh ngembaliin apa yg mereka beri buatku. jadi, aku milih bertahan sampai SAY THE NAME, SEVENTEEN yg terakhir kalinya. dan buat kalian, carats. kalian juga memotivasiku, banyak banget. aku merasa bangga punya keluarga seperti kalian. semoga aku, kalian, dan seventeen tetap seperti ini. aku sayang kalian dan terima kasih :)

author: @harynahoon
text: Went to their concert in 2018 and it was such a memorable one. It hurts to see them sick and tired during all the concerts they amazingly did their best just to put a smile on CARATS faces. All 13 of them are angels. Thank you for always do your best in everything. SEVENTEEN has never fail to make me the happiest whenever im down. Thank you to SEVENTEEN for being the first group for me to attend their concert here in Msia. I am truly amazed by the experience I had with them. Seeing them on stage with the brightest smile had brought so much meaning in my life. There are time I found life is awfully hard for me to go thru, but im lucky that SEVENTEEN managed to be with me thru their songs whenever I am about to give up. Thank you SEVENTEEN, i love you. Thank you for always make it happened.

Kita, Kembali

Supaya kamu bisa berjalan dengan nyaman
Aku akan membuat jalan yang nyaman untukmu
Meskipun aku diterjang ombak
Kita akan bisa berdiri di atas ombak
Di atas jalan yang asing
Siapapun bisa tersesat 
Aku akan terus bersamamu
Sampai kita bisa bernyanyi bersama, sampai saat itu 
Jalan ini tidak akan berakhir 
Dengan semua alasan dan jalan ini
Karena ada kamu yang indah 
Dan ketika kita kembali ke ujung jalan 
Maka kamu tidak akan lelah 
Aku akan melindungimu
Bagaimanapun kita harus bertemu lagi

text: Letâ€™s just say I didnâ€™t expect to have my eyes to sting with tears and I never get emotional but I did, and lest also just say I started stanning Seventeen a month ago and I would like to say never have I actually have seen them lacking off as a producer, dancer, and singer is something they are all good, and their voices are just so mesmerizing to the fact I feel like we should all know woozi is a tiny little amazing genius, and that they are all so talented and sometimes Joshua is underrated, but if thereâ€™s one thing I know is that they all are talented in every single way, and that you donâ€™t have to just buy albums, but merch, go to all their concerts, and even do more than that, but we should all appreciate their music because thatâ€™s their goal for us to love their music, and Kpop isnâ€™t just concerts, albums, light sticks, merch, and more but itâ€™s so much more than that, and although Seventeen may have not been my first group theyâ€™ll always be with me in my heart and be one of the most talented groups out there with all others groups, so if thereâ€™s one thing we should do is appreciate seventeenâ€™s music and other Kpop groups music.

text:
Seventeen's presence in my life is the most inspiring and amazing sensation from mansae era and onwards. I have looked to them to feel positivity and optimism towards the life I lead. Whenever I'm down and consoling to friends they would tell me, "listen to seventeen!" As a way to cheer me up because they know how much seventeen has brought me joy in hard times when I couldn't find the motivation to even smile. 

I admit there was a time where I fell out of seventeen or more of like held out on them. I don't mean to bring up an extremely sensitive subject but after Jonghyun's death it made me realize the extent of an Idol's life and how different it is to how they really are (I've always known this but when something incredibly serious happens its makes it frighteningly real). I admit, though not fair, I began to distrust seventeen's sincerty and doubted everything they say in front of the camera because I felt it was a script or a director telling them what to say. I wasnt even a shawol but having grown up with the 2nd gen kpop groups, it still left me in a sobbing mess for days. This made me scared that if the same thing were to happen to seventeen, god forbid, I can not imagine the downfall of my mental and emotional state. I got so scared that I started to distance myself from seventeen and kpop in general. 

After a year, I finally returned and though I am not as active or as invested as I used to be, I rediscovered my deep gratitude and appreciation for seventeen. Through this series, it made me break down those walls of doubt and mistrust that I held towards seventeen. If there is one thing I can count on from seventeen, it is their raw and honest feelings they hold for us as we do for them. I see them as brothers and friends who are filled with wisdom and kindness. They have and always were my ultimate group but they will be the only group I deeply care for and spend time watching. I appreciate other groups too but I just listen to their songs as opposed to getting too into them as a group or people. For me, these 13 men are all I need to be content and happy in the kpop fandom.

author: @aliphiarefisa6981
text:
Mau tutorial cimol anti meledak gak?

Mauu

Oke cus.

1. Siapin adonan cimolnya (resepnya cari di gugel, saya males ngetik)
2. Kalo udh siap adonannya buletÂ²in.
3.Siapin minyak buat goreng, boleh bimoli, boleh sania. Treserah apa aja yang penting minyak, tapi jangan minyak urut juga
4.Panasin minyaknya. Biar cepet panas kataÂ²in aja.
5.Kalo udh panas cemplungin adonan cimolnya.
6.Pas di goreng jangan di kasih bom, ntar meledak. Bukan satu rumah doang yang meledak. Satu RT kena brou.
7.Goreng sampe mateng. Kalo takut meledak pake jas ujan sama helm aja.
8.Kalo udh mateng angkat, jangan ditinggal ntar gosong. Kan apinya blm di matiin. 
9.Matiin apinya dlu baru di angkat ya. Matiinnya jangan di tiup, ntar ga matiÂ². Di puter tu cetekannya.
10.Kalo udh mati angkat, tiriskan, diputar, dijilat, jangan di celupin lagi.
11.Taro di piring, kasih bumbu dehh. Boleh bumbu asin, boleh manis, boleh pedes. Selera lu aja dah.

Sekian tutorial dari saya, semoga bermanfaat!

author: @xushii9984
text: It's taken me a day to fully put all my words coherently... and I know that there are so many other people who feel the same way, that Seventeen has been the home I can come home to. The moment this song came out I was just sobbing, holding my chest and just chanting many thank yous to the air. I felt so comforted and... I didn't feel alone, finally. For the whole day I put this song on loop and I've been streaming it. Even though I know Seventeen shouldn't be my everything, they have been such a big part of my life. They've always brought me back up. They've taught me that it's okay to not walk so quickly all the time. We'll all get there, it isn't a matter of time. I definitely haven't been with Seventeen since the beginning, but I know I'll stay until the end. The last "say the name" might just be the start of something new, and when that day comes, I'll still be so happy and thankful for Seventeen. Imagine, 7 years of just love, producing beautiful music, making precious memories... this song just comforts themselves and CARATs as well that no matter what happens, we'll see each other again.

author: @Fangirlqueen17
text:
Five years went by so fast, you never stopped moving forward. Thank you for sharing your talent, passion and sincerity. From "boys who dance to NoNoNo & 2nd Gen Kpop songs" to being the ultimate boy group I stan. I can't believe that I used to watched those clips on repeat from your predebut days to seeing new content you create for us.
Thank you for loving us as your fans and for acknowledging our existence . Nobody's perfect but you guys as SEVENTEEN became one! Throughout these years you never ceased to amazed me by your dedication. I've been a Kpop fan for 13 years now and you are one of I admire the most. Despite the ups and downs, you strived to show your own color. Regardless of the comparisons between you and other Idol groups, you remained as who you are. Took the challenge to level up yourself. I love you guys! I hope you will stay healthy and happy. May great things happen to all of us! SEVENTEEN will be FOREVER LOVED by CARATS â¤ï¸ğŸ˜­

author: @soleinquinn775
text: I only started liking kpop when my friends introduced me to it back when i was in 8th grade. And back then I'm still not that into it probably because I haven't really found a kpop group that I feel really connected to until Seventeen came. Everything just clicked with me and Seventeen and up till now I think Seventeen will be my "one and only". Even though i might like other kpop groups' songs, it's still Seventeen for me. I love all their songs, all their choreos, all their performances, all their members, personalities, EVERYTHING that makes up Seventeen. Woozi is my ultimate bias but I love every single one of them. "Smile Flower" hit me straight in the heart and now "Us, Again" dug deep and buried itself in my heart. Thank You Seventeen, I'm proud to be a carat and no matter what happens in the future I WILL ALWAYS LOVE AND SUPPORT YOU. ğŸ’—â¤â£ï¸ğŸ¤—

author: @veahland
text:
i felt like its been such a long journey. since ive stanned svt, starting around the CLAP era, ive always felt like theyre the people who make me feel welcomed. theyre family. theyre the people i can turn to when im feeling sad. seeing them in concert just confirmed that. theyre my everything, they've helped me through so much and have helped me survive and grow in my life. they, themselves, have grown so much. i feel like this journey has been long, but i never want it to end. 
thank you, all thirteen of you. seungcheol, jeonghan, joshua, jun, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, minghao, mingyu, seokmin, seungkwan, hansol, chan. youre all my family. carats are my family. theres many other fandoms i call 'family', but carats and seventeen really are the ones who make me feel at home. youre all my home. i love all of you guys so much. 
thank you for helping us all grow. youre our shining diamonds.

text:
For years, I struggled with depression. It really messed me up, and clouded my high school and early college years with doubts and insecurities. After having to withdraw from school for the sake of my mental health this December, I hit a low point. I wasn't sure if I could go on, or if I'd lost my way forever. Still, I had one thing to look forward to--I'd started stanning Seventeen in August of 2016, but I hadn't had an opportunity to go to one of their concerts until now. Slowly, I'd come to love and trust them, until they became the brightest light in my world. Then, I got to see them in Newark this past January.

Everything changed. I could feel it start when they started singing 9-Teen, as I was two months shy of my 20th birthday--at the end of my teenage years, and the lyrics really resonated with me. Then, after the last Aju Nice, their last goodbye, standing there under the infinite confetti rain, listening to Our Dawn is Brighter Than Day, one of my favorite songs, I really understood--I'm loved by these thirteen amazing young men. These people who cheered with me for the last three hours, they're with me through this. I can do this. For the first time in five years, holding a piece of confetti, I felt truly alive.

Six months later, and I'm back in school, earning A's for the first time since middle school. I found my path, and I'm walking it hand in hand with Seventeen.

Thank you to Seventeen, for bringing light back into my life. Thank you Carat, for passing the torch to me. I love you all.

author: @natashaghazali4757
text: I can't believe it's already been 5 years with my 13 kings T.T Seventeen has truly gotten me through some of the darkest moments of my life, especially after my father passed away 6 months ago. Their "Ode to Your" tour in the US was the only thing I was able to look forward to during the winter. I can't even begin to express how thankful I am for all of the hard work Seventeen puts into their creative content and performances. They inspire me to find myself, and find reasons to keep going after my dreams. Seeing their raw, vulnerable sides in "Hit the Road" broke my heart in so many ways. They're so strong, but I only wish they allow themselves breaks to rest, and to heal, and seek the same comfort that I feel when I listen to their voices. They're like my 13 multivitamins - a daily dose of Seventeen has helped to alleviate my depression. They bring me so much laughter and light and warmth, that the only words I can say to capture my gratitude are "Thank you". I love you guys so much and will support you until the very end! Though I don't want to imagine a future without Seventeen, I know our memories will be immortalized in the music.

author: @snoozemiu
text: although it's only been a year since i decided to stand with seventeen, i haven't had a single regret since. every moment i've spent with them stays in my heart as some of the happiest moments in my life so far. seventeen has gotten me through some of the toughest experiences of my life to this day, and nothing i say or do will ever express the almost overwhelmingly abundant amount of gratitude i have for you, the 13 men who have strived to not only achieve success, but to give back just as much love, support, and gratitude to us. i can honestly say that you have made me into a better person. thank you for making so many of us feel less alone in our thoughts, and for being a safe haven to us with your music and each of your personalities. your words, art, and even seeing so much as you guys simply being content and living your lives, gives us so much happiness and security in our lives. it always amazes me how you almost seem to give back to us tenfold. for everything you've given us, all i can say is thank you. thank you for being our home, our safe haven, our 13 wonderful shining souls. please know that you can trust we will be the same to you, even long after the final "say the name." let's meet again soon, i hope you're happy and healthy. you deserve the world and so much more. â™¥ï¸

author: @yorukaadams940
text: I literally joined the fandom two days after HIT came out, but I've fallen in love with everything about this group. Their individual histories, their history as a group, the energy and love of the fandom that I hope never spoils as the group grows (you guys are so chill and happy omg) all pull me in and their music consoles and uplifts me. I once wrote a few paragraphs about MY I for English class. However, no amount of words could encompass what they've done, what they've gone through and who they are as one and 13. It's a beautiful experience, once in a million lifetimes. Stan Seventeen.

author: @katie0707
text:
itâ€™s half way through the day and iâ€™m in floods of tears. no one will ever understand the amount of love and appreciation i have for seventeen. for each and every member. theyâ€™ve helped me through it all. i donâ€™t regret falling for them at all. theyâ€™re my brothers, my family, my home. thank you seventeen, for continuing to work hard no matter what. thank you for never giving up on your members or us, your carats. weâ€™ll always be here, till the end and beyond then. i am forever grateful for each of you. 
i find it hard to open up about my emotions. all my sadness, tiredness and feelings build up and itâ€™s only when everyone else in the house is asleep and itâ€™s 2am where i can truly let my emotions out. i vent to seventeenâ€™s music or to videos about them. i havenâ€™t even finished hit the road yet because of how emotional i get. it breaks me to see them exhaust themselves for us and to feel depressed and anxious. it really made me realise that theyâ€™re human too, theyâ€™re no different from me.
when i listen to smile flower, or to hug, or to any slower seventeen song, i like to let the moment last. i donâ€™t get the chance to listen to them often because i donâ€™t allow myself to be upset. iâ€™m embarrassed in front of others when i get upset. 
with us again, i feel even more passionate about my love for them. because of seventeen, i get through everyday and strive to be the best person i possibly can be, and thatâ€™s what theyâ€™d want for us. 
i donâ€™t mean to get personal, but last year and the year before then, i was getting badly bullied in school. i dealt with it, and it got sorted out, but i had insane trust issues afterwards. to make it worse, in august of 2019, my cat passed away. he helped me through the bullying and he was my best friend. it was seventeen and seventeen alone who nursed me back to health and to a stable mindset. iâ€™m still grieving over my cat, but thanks to seventeen i learned how to trust again and to love again. i now have the bestest friends anyone could ever hope for, and i know the most beautiful people ever, and itâ€™s seventeen i have to thank for that.
thank you; seungcheol, jeonghan, jisoo, junhui, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, minghao, mingyu, seokmin, seungkwan, hansol and chan. i will FOREVER be a carat, and i mean that. thank you for being there for me when i felt that no one else was. i will be there always, till the last say the name and after. â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸

author: @juleleo4997
text: I've never, not even for a second, regretted ultimating Seventeen. They've been with me in my darkest times and have become my home. They make my sleepless nights feel less lonley and painful. I am so grateful for everything they did. For about half a year now I've been really stressed out and felt lazy/slowed down because of it and I hate myself for it. But Seventeen has always been there to tell me that everything will be alright, that it's okay to approach things slowly for some time and that I'll find my path some day. I haven't found that path yet, but once I did I'll continue walking it with them by my side. Thank you Seventeen.

author: @oneandonlycox
text:
I WAS NOT READY TO CRY
Since carats are telling their stories, here's mine! I discovered them 
when they debuted, I knew the songs and the members. However, it was 
when Mansae came out that I really decided to stan. Then, when the Love Letter 
album came out, I fell in love with each one of them... this era reminds
 me of so many good memories, I was AMAZED by Pretty U and Popular 
Song!! 
Seventeen is one of (if not) the best groups out there! They are 
talented, hilarious, they can work on their own and we can see that they

author: @yuniani8423
text:
Thank you seventeen for being exist in my life. 

I'm a multi fandom, and already being a kpopers at least for 10 years. I've known seventeen for years but only for their title songs. I can't even tell kyeom and wonwoo also shua and jeonghan apart. But HIT and FEAR really draw me and maybe same as some people out there, I think "well, let's try to remember their name". Start from that, I'm spending all of my quarantine time watching most of their reality show and end up falling for them. In my opinion, from all groups that I've been stanning, seventeen is the most lovely one. How they react, how they love one another, their passion and their consistency to show their love for carats really amazed me. Once again, thank you for being such a wonderful group and exist in my life.

author: @tillthelastsaythename
text:
I get asked quite often, "why do you support kpop?" "Are you crazy?" I wish to shout to the world "its not just K-Pop..it's not just some craze about some handsome boys.. Its their music, passion, dedication.. Its to watch n listen to stories of tears, resilience, growth despite struggles, persistence towards their goals, not losing hope.. And then remembering that while they are growing in their life, they are sharing their talent with me and helping me grow, keeping me focused on my dream.. 

Seventeen is not just hard choreographies, beauty, synchronisation and self production.. Seventeen is also support system for fans, standing up for what's right, message of hope & mental strength and above all a family.. 

Till the last 'Say the name's & beyond...

author: @ellenpoon5942
text:
I have only been a fan since HIT, but it feels as if I was a Carat for even longer than that. I feel as if I never got into them, like they were here in my heart forever. Seventeen is one of the only few groups I have this feeling for. 

Lately I have been going through a lot of things, and this documentary has comforted me, even though it made me cry, both of joy and sadness. Seeing other people, especially artists, expressing how they feel has helped me. Releasing this song, knowing the general lyrics from their documentary, means a lot to me. This is one of the few songs that I will keep close to my heart. 

I realized that being a Carat was one of the decisions made in my life that I will never regret. EVER. I hope that other Carats, or even people who just randomly find them, can be comforted by this group. 

THANK YOU SEVENTEEN, FOR HELPING ME GET THROUGH THE THINGS I HAVE FACED.

author: @izabela6687
text:
When i was listening to this song for who-knows-which-time I remembered how people say they don't listen to songs they don't understand, because of language. And i had a thought that it only means they don't listen to it to appreciate the song, they just listen to the words, and the words are only a part of the whole message sent us by artist.
When carats listened to Us again at first, even when not knowing the lyrics we felt, we knew, we heard what they were telling us. Because we listened whole heartedly to the song, not just lyrics, and the lyrics only made the song more special.
And i want to laugh at people not listening to other languages, it's them that should be laughed at, not kpop stans or people who listen to any other languages. They miss out big time.

author: @chwehweui7336
text:
I was only 5th Grade when I became a Carat, I was so confused that time. I even thought the other members as the others HAHAHAHAHAH but that only last for 2 days. I've managed to memorize all of them. That was way back in 2017, in between DWC era and Baksu era. Then, they really inspired me that time even though I only started stanning them for like months. I am really motivated to finish my studies and everything.

 I, then, went to 6th Grade with recognition and honors, thanks to them. When I was in 6th grade, I remember me, being so problematic. But every time I listen to them sing and rap, watching them dance, watching them perform, watching them grow, watching them achieve their dreams, all of those problems were washed away by them. All I could see in myself that time was the smile and tears of joy that they brought to me. I graduated from elementary, thanks to Seventeen, once again.

 Leveled up again. 7th Grade then welcomed me last year, too many stress and frustration hugged me. I was so depressed, frustrated, stressed, and it even led me to anxiety. "Damn those studies. Damn these thesis. Damn these tests. Damn these diagnostics. Damn these lectures. Damn these family problems. Damn these fake friends. Damn this society. Damn." That's everything that I could only think of that time, but I thought of Seventeen. To soothe and ease all the pain away, I just let my thoughts shrink down and listen to Seventeen's songs. Hug then played. I really cried so hard and spent my whole night listening to Hug, as well as, Campfire, Run to You, Smile Flower, Thanks, and Home. I became motivated once again. I became optimistic. 

And I found myself, after months, free from stress (but not from frustration).I just finished my first year this year, and now moving on the 8th Grade. Thanks to Seventeen. 
My mother is really against with the thought of me, being a Kpop fan, and keeps on saying that I am just wasting my time for them. And whenever I am telling her that I would like to buy merch, she would say "you're wasting money." even if I am the one who will save money and pay for it. But I ignored that though, I will prove to Mom that Seventeen is not a distraction, afterall they are inspirations and our motivations. 
*Thanks to Seventeen. Thank you for everything you've done for us. Thank you from saving me, and other carats, from anxiety. Thank you for being the motivations and inspirations that we needed. Thank you for being the shoulders that we can lean on. Thank you for being our home and healing. Thank you for everything, Seventeen! Let's be together forever! Until the last! Say the Name, Seventeen!*
*Seventeen Best Boys!!* *SARANGHAEEE!*

author: @trishaluvventwong7306
text:
This song is my new smile flower.

 The first seventeen song to make me cry without context (lyrics translation). A lot of seventeen songs made me cry, but that's with the addition of visual and lyrics translation.

I can't express how deep this touched me, I resonate and relate so hard to them. I love them so much. I've said most of it n the last episode but I can't not comment on this. So grateful to be a carat.

No other bond will ever be able to replace seventeen-carat because we're family. From now, until the end. Even at the end, memories will take its place.

Forever grateful to slip into the diamond life at March 2017. Forever grateful to feel for them. Forever grateful for the introduction to my close carat friends. Forever grateful for the journey together â¤ï¸

- a carat

author: @charitz4229
text: I became a carat not long ago this year, but it was during quarantine that I sincerely and with all my heart became a seventeen fan. We haven't been together for too long, but they have already helped when I needed it. I have been stressed and feeling like I was becoming failure, I was loosing myself. But Seventeen made me think and realize that I could do it, that I just had to keep on fighting. I looked forward to "Hit the Road" every week, and at night I open weverse wanting to "meet" them, even if it's just by reading what they put. I am a multi-fandom, and not many groups make me feel this way. Thank you, Seventeen. I look forward to many more years with you. I still got a lot to learn about you, but you already have a place in my heart.

author: @eilliworld
text:
6+7+2+0+2+0=17
Song released at 0526pm.
-
Thank you for your music. Thank you for your dance choreography. Thank you for your voice. Thank you for caring for us. Thank you for always being the best boys. Thank you for being crackheads. Thank you for being their at my darkest moments. Thank you for bringing happiness and light into my life. Thank you for giving me hope. Thank you for being such a good inspiration. Thank you for saving my life. Thank you for everything you've done. Thank you for existing. SINCERELY THANK YOU TO OUR MULTI-TALENTED BOYS, SEVENTEEN. ğŸ’

author: @allehandeulla
text:
I knew it. They are king of the spoiler and every single word from hit the road war part of either a poem or this... A very beautiful and poetic song. And as I write this my heart is filled with a very special heat, a proud like heat because I know that being a carat was the best decision I've ever made. That going to their concert is the best experience in my life yet and that laughing, crying, learning with these 13 guys is one of the best things ever. They've given us SO MUCh starting with the tour and then HTR and then this and then a Mini Album. And... I'm just so proud of them, as Jun said, I'm proud of them even when they just breath... I'm proud of SEVENTEEN, I'm proud of CARAT too. I'm proud of being a carat for almost 5 years and I will never regret this. 
S.coups, if this was the song you were listening during the weverse conversations... I don't even know what to say but I know that you are a proud as us for this masterpiece. 
Thank you SEVENTEEN. 
Thank you so much for being the best, for being our lights, for being whatever we need you to be whenever we need it... I hope we are the same for you and that this beautiful relationship we (SVTÃ—CARAT) share lasts as long as it can last. 
Thanks again. 
Now I'll drown in my tears while listening to this amazing song again.
